title: Product Designer (Mobile Application UI/UX)
description:
**Description**


We are seeking a dynamic and passionate Product Designer to lead and oversee the design process, ensuring the delivery of high-quality user experiences for our mobile applications.

**The Job:**

* Design Leadership: Provide leadership and guidance in the design process, ensuring alignment with product goals and user needs.
* Core Design Work: Personally execute core design tasks, including wireframing, prototyping, and creating visual designs for mobile interfaces.
* Delegation and Mentorship: Delegate design tasks to junior designers as appropriate, providing guidance and mentorship to support their growth and development.
* Collaboration: Collaborate closely with product managers, developers, and other stakeholders to ensure seamless integration of design solutions into the product development process.
* Quality Assurance: Conduct regular reviews of design work to ensure adherence to design principles, brand guidelines, and usability standards.
* Feedback and Iteration: Provide constructive feedback on design work and iterate on designs based on user feedback and usability testing results.
* Documentation: Create and maintain design documentation, including design systems, style guides, and specifications, to support consistent design implementation across platforms.
* User Research: Participate in user research activities, including user interviews, usability testing, and data analysis, to inform design decisions and validate design solutions.
* Stay Updated: Stay updated on design trends, tools, and best practices, and share knowledge with the design team to foster continuous learning and improvement.
* Communication: Communicate design decisions, rationale, and progress effectively to stakeholders, and facilitate design reviews and presentations as needed.

**Requirements**

**The Person:**

* 3 - 5 years experience as a UI/UX designer.
* Basic understanding of Figma components and prototyping is a must.
* Excellent verbal and written communication skills.
* Excellent eye for aesthetic design and customer appeal.
* Good understanding of colour science and combinations.
* Artistic and innovative flair.
* Excellent attention to detail.
* Meticulous and diligent.

Strong knowledge of the industry and market trends.  
* 

**Benefits**

* **Annual Leaves-** Additional annual leave will be credited to you on a yearly basis.
* **Medical and Insurance Coverages -** We have got you covered.
* **Subsidies -** Enhancing your well-being, we offer optical and dental subsidies
* **Opportunities -** Above training and guidance, you will have the opportunity to try, to build your confidence and become your best self, and to interact and build a strong relationship.
* **Rocking Diversity**- Play hard, work harder with people of diverse skill sets and experiences! Challange yourself to step out of your comfort zone, and you'll find yourself growing in way you'd never imagine.

title: UX/UI Designer
description:
**Xensam:** SAM DisruptersXensam is the leading provider of AI-powered, cloud-hosted Software Asset Management technology. We’re looking for key players to join us as we scale our impact and build the Xensam team together. We take our culture seriously and strive to maintain the excellence, energy & enthusiasm that flows through the organization today.
  
We look for candidates who are passionate about what they do and ready to work the Xensam way. We know that experience counts, but we also know that it’s you, the person behind the experience, that makes it count.
  
About the roleAre you a UX/UI maestro with a knack for crafting exceptional user experiences and stunning designs? Do you excel at creating design components with the latest tools and technologies and have a passion for creating user-friendly, easy-to-use interfaces and designs? If you're ready to shape the future of a groundbreaking SAM tool, then this opportunity is tailor-made for you!
  
As our UX/UI Designer, you will take ownership of the role and play a pivotal role in defining the visual identity and user experience of our SAM tool. Your expertise in design tools and frameworks will be instrumental in creating a seamless and visually appealing interface that delights our users.
  
Responsibilities
  
Collaborate closely with cross-functional teams to understand user needs and business requirements.
  
Design and prototype user interfaces using relevant tools and platforms.
  
Create design components that enhance usability and elevate the overall user experience.
  
Work hand-in-hand with developers to ensure design implementation aligns with the product vision and user requirements.
  
  

Qualifications
  
Strong background in UX/UI design with a focus on usability and exceptional design aesthetics.
  
Experience working with design tools like Storybook, Figma, and other industry-standard platforms.
  
Familiarity with design frameworks and tools to streamline the design process.
  
Self-motivated, proactive, and able to work independently in a fast-paced environment.
  
Experience working with React/HTML/CSS/SASS and similar related technologies.
  
Strong verbal and written communication skills in fluent English and Swedish.
  
  

Bonus points if
  
You have worked with data-driven A/B testing of designs.
  
You have worked with SaaS web applications prior.
  
  

What we offer
  
A dynamic role that focuses on "freedom under responsibility"
  
3 days in-office schedule (remote Mondays & Fridays)
  
A generous work culture with free access to beverages & snacks, gym, bi-weekly massages at the office, shuffleboard, and other games etc.
  
If sales targets are met, an annual destination trip awaits all employees
  
Work with a diverse group driven by ambition as well as having fun together with different activities
  
Great opportunity to influence your career development as well as the company's
  
Work with the latest technology in the fastest-growing SAM software in the market
  
  

**At Xensam, our core values define our workplace atmosphere:**  

REBELLIOUS We foster a rebellious spirit, promoting freedom within responsibilities and encouraging initiative.
  
HUMANE Our team promotes a caring, inclusive environment where diversity is valued, and individuals are respected and empowered to be themselves.
  
HARMONIOUS We prioritize harmony, valuing work-life balance, and creating a pleasant atmosphere.
  
As part of your application, please provide links to your prior designs and portfolio, such as Behance or Dribble!

title: Join Textalk Group as a Project and Experience Specialist
description:
### **About Us**


At Textalk, we’ve been innovators in accessibility and digital solutions for over 40 years. What started as a mission to make newspapers accessible to the visually impaired has evolved into creating cutting-edge technology that empowers people and businesses worldwide.


With a remote-first team across 10 countries, we focus on three key areas: helping media transition to digital, enabling SMEs to build strong customer relationships, and developing software that ensures accessibility for all.


Join us at Textalk, where your work can make a real impact, and be part of a team of 7 dedicated individuals in product and design that's redefining the future of digital experiences.

### **The Role**


As our Project and Experience Specialist, you will drive product development from idea to execution. Your mission? Transform broad concepts into user-friendly solutions by creating intuitive prototypes for web and mobile platforms. You will lead cross-functional teams, motivating and inspiring both clients and colleagues to ensure that projects not only meet but exceed customer expectations.


We value an entrepreneurial spirit and look forward to your contributions in creating value in every situation. If you are passionate about leading projects and making a meaningful impact, this role is for you!

### **What you would be doing**

**Technical Project Management**


You will gather requirements, create comprehensive project plans with clear objectives, and lead the work in cross-functional teams. Coordinating tasks across multiple projects while proactively managing risks will be essential to your role

  


**Product Design & User Experience**


In this role, you will turn conceptual ideas into valuable, user-friendly solutions. You will contribute to product strategy and design elegant user experiences for various platforms, including web, Android, and iOS, ensuring they are simple and effective

 **Product Development**


You will drive ongoing product development by analyzing market data and customer feedback. Innovating new product ideas and optimizing development processes will be key to staying ahead in the market.

### **What we are looking for**

**Qualifications:**

* Relevant degree or qualification in engineering or a related field.
* A minimum of 3 years of experience in Tech or SaaS companies in a similar role, with an emphasis on diverse perspectives.

**Skills:**

  

* Proficiency in tools like Figma, Sketch, Adobe, or similar for creating comprehensive prototypes, including both UX and UI.
* Strong technical understanding and experience in managing complex projects with a collaborative approach.
* Project management skills with the ability to balance multiple projects effectively.
* A deep understanding of customer journeys and user experience, considering diverse user needs.
* **Bonus:** Familiarity with SaaS and a passion for tech’s positive impact.
* **Language:** Proficiency in both Swedish and English, with strong written and verbal communication skills.

### **What we can offer you in return**


A fantastic workplace with awesome colleagues, a powerful purpose, opportunities for growth and learning, and an innovative environment with competitive benefits. We encourage out-of-the-box thinking, transparency, and boldness. You can work fully remotely or from our office in Mölndal, Sweden. Read more about our benefits here: https://career.textalk.com/

title: UX/UI Designer

* A generous work culture with free access to beverages & snacks, gym, bi-weekly massages at the office, shuffleboard, and other games etc.
* If sales targets are met, an annual destination trip awaits all employees
* Work with a diverse group driven by ambition as well as having fun together with different activities
* Great opportunity to influence your career development as well as the company's
* Work with the latest technology in the fastest-growing SAM software in the market


At Xensam, our core values define our workplace atmosphere:

**REBELLIOUS** We foster a rebellious spirit, promoting freedom within responsibilities and encouraging initiative.

**HUMANE** Our team promotes a caring, inclusive environment where diversity is valued, and individuals are respected and empowered to be themselves.

**HARMONIOUS** We prioritize harmony, valuing work-life balance, and creating a pleasant atmosphere.


As part of your application, **please provide links to your prior designs and portfolio, such as Behance or Dribble!**

title: Senior Digital Projektledare
description:
*Är du redo att ta nästa steg i din karriär som projektledare? Har du erfarenhet av att leda komplexa digitala projekt och brinner för att göra skillnad på riktigt? Då kan du vara den vi söker!*

*Hos Knowit Experience får du möjligheten att arbeta med spännande och utmanande projekt inom webb, intranät och verksamhetskritiska system. Vi tror starkt på kraften i samarbete och som projektledare hos oss arbetar du nära tvärfunktionella team bestående av utvecklare, UX-designers och testledare. Din roll är att agera rådgivare för våra kunder, förstå deras verksamhet och driva deras digitala utveckling framåt.*

**Vad vi erbjuder:**


I rollen som senior projektledare kommer du att ha ett övergripande ansvar för större, mer komplexa projekt, ofta i nya kundsamarbeten. Du kommer att leda projekt från start till mål, med ansvar för projektets intäkter, kostnader, resultat och tidsramar. Genom din expertis och ledarskapsförmåga skapar du beredskap för förändring och utveckling, och hanterar oväntade händelser med kreativa lösningar.


Du leder genom coaching, sätter tydliga mål och ger dina teammedlemmar friheten att själva ansvara för hur målen ska uppnås. Samtidigt samverkar du med beställare, utbildar dem och leder dem genom projektets olika faser. Du deltar i styrgruppsmöten när möjlighet ges, för att ge en korrekt bild av projektets status och identifiera nya affärsmöjligheter.

**Vi söker dig som har:**

* Flera års erfarenhet av digital projektledning med erfarenhet inom webb, e-handel och intranät.
* God förståelse för agil utvecklingsmetodik (Scrum, SAFe) och erfarenhet av att arbeta iterativt.
* Erfarenhet av att leverera intranät, gärna med plattformar som Optimizely/Episerver eller Umbraco.
* Kunskap om molnlösningar och Office 365.
* Förmåga att facilitera möten och workshops samt en vana att presentera inför ledningsgrupper.
* Ett genuint intresse för digitala medier och samspelet mellan teknik och kommunikation.

**Meriterande erfarenheter:**

* Erfarenhet av projektstyrningsmodeller som PPS.
* Arbetat med tillgänglighetsanpassning enligt WCAG.
* Förmåga att identifiera och kommunicera nya affärsmöjligheter hos befintliga och potentiella kunder.

**Vem är du?**


Du är en passionerad ledare som trivs med att coacha och inspirera andra. Du har en naturlig förmåga att skapa dialog och utveckla både team och projekt. Som kommunikatör är du duktig på att förmedla planer, visioner och uppföljningar både på svenska och engelska. Du har en stark affärsmässig förståelse och kan identifiera nya möjligheter hos våra kunder.


Låter det här som du? Varmt välkommen med din ansökan och bli en del av Knowit Experience, där du får möjlighet att växa och göra skillnad på riktigt!

title: UX/UI Designer
description:
**Xensam: SAM Disrupters** 




 Xensam is the leading provider of AI-powered, cloud-hosted Software Asset Management technology. We’re looking for key players to join us as we scale our impact and build the Xensam team together. We take our culture seriously and strive to maintain the excellence, energy & enthusiasm that flows through the organization today.
 



  





 We look for candidates who are passionate about what they do and ready to work the Xensam way. We know that experience counts, but we also know that it’s you, the person behind the experience, that makes it count.
 



  





**About the role** 




 Are you a UX/UI maestro with a knack for crafting exceptional user experiences and stunning designs? Do you excel at creating design components with the latest tools and technologies and have a passion for creating user-friendly, easy-to-use interfaces and designs? If you're ready to shape the future of a groundbreaking SAM tool, then this opportunity is tailor-made for you!
 



  





 As our UX/UI Designer, you will take ownership of the role and play a pivotal role in defining the visual identity and user experience of our SAM tool. Your expertise in design tools and frameworks will be instrumental in creating a seamless and visually appealing interface that delights our users.
 



  





**Responsibilities** 



* Collaborate closely with cross-functional teams to understand user needs and business requirements.
* Design and prototype user interfaces using relevant tools and platforms.
* Create design components that enhance usability and elevate the overall user experience.
* Work hand-in-hand with developers to ensure design implementation aligns with the product vision and user requirements.



  





**Qualifications** 



* Strong background in UX/UI design with a focus on usability and exceptional design aesthetics.
* Experience working with design tools like Storybook, Figma, and other industry-standard platforms.
* Familiarity with design frameworks and tools to streamline the design process.
* Self-motivated, proactive, and able to work independently in a fast-paced environment.
* Experience working with React/HTML/CSS/SASS and similar related technologies.
* **Strong verbal and written communication skills in fluent English and Swedish.**



  





**Bonus points if** 



* You have worked with data-driven A/B testing of designs.
* You have worked with SaaS web applications prior.



  





**What we offer** 



* A dynamic role that focuses on "freedom under responsibility"
* 3 days in-office schedule (remote Mondays & Fridays)
* A generous work culture with free access to beverages & snacks, gym, bi-weekly massages at the office, shuffleboard, and other games etc.
* If sales targets are met, an annual destination trip awaits all employees
* Work with a diverse group driven by ambition as well as having fun together with different activities
* Great opportunity to influence your career development as well as the company's

**REBELLIOUS** 
 We foster a rebellious spirit, promoting freedom within responsibilities and encouraging initiative.
 



**HUMANE** 
 Our team promotes a caring, inclusive environment where diversity is valued, and individuals are respected and empowered to be themselves.
 



**HARMONIOUS** 
 We prioritize harmony, valuing work-life balance, and creating a pleasant atmosphere.

title: UX/UI Writer to Travel Company!
description:
Are you passionate about crafting seamless digital experiences through words and multimedia? Our customer are looking for a
 **UX Writer** 
 to join their Digital & IT team, where you'll play a key role in shaping the future of travel. If you thrive in a collaborative environment and love creating content that enhances user journeys, we want to hear from you!
   

  

 About the Role:
   

  

 As a UX Writer, you'll collaborate closely with designers, product teams, and other stakeholders to elevate the digital experience for our customers. Your work will go beyond just writing; you’ll integrate multimedia elements—such as images, videos, and animations—to make complex information clear and engaging. You’ll also ensure that all content is user-friendly, accessible, and aligned with the brand guidelines.
   

  

 Key Responsibilities:
   

  

* Write user-friendly UI content in English for digital platforms.
* Enhance content with multimedia elements like videos, animations, and images.
* Ensure consistency in messaging, tone, and adherence to accessibility standards.
* Proofread and optimize content for clarity, conversion, and SEO.
* Manage and update content through a headless CMS platform.
* Collaborate with design, product teams, and stakeholders to create engaging digital content.


 Your Profile:
   

  

* Experience: 2–4 years in UX writing, copywriting, or creating digital content.
* Language skills: Fluent in English with excellent grammar and style.
* Multimedia expertise: Basic knowledge of image editing (e.g., Photoshop) and familiarity with integrating multimedia content.
* CMS & Design Tools: Experience working with headless CMS platforms (e.g., Contentful) and collaboration through Figma.
* Attention to detail: A keen eye for clarity, consistency, and accessibility in all content.


 Bonus Points:
   

  

* Fluency in Scandinavian languages or other languages.
* Knowledge of SEO and accessibility best practices.
* Experience in the travel industry or a passion for travel-related content.
* Familiarity with video-editing and animation tools.


 Who You Are:
   

  

 You’re curious, creative, and eager to explore new ways to communicate complex ideas simply. You’re detail-oriented, adaptable, and enjoy working in a collaborative team environment, all while keeping the end-user in mind.
   

  

 If you’re excited about transforming the digital travel experience through engaging content, we’d love to hear from you!

title: Senior UX/UI designer
description:
**About ROYC**
 ROYC, founded in early 2022 by former Blackstone and Nordea executives, is a private markets investment platform, purpose built for the complex European market, focusing on streamlining and optimizing private equity fund life cycle management. ROYCs enterprise solutions is tailored to private equity General Partners, banks, wealth managers, and Multi Family Offices, allowing them to efficiently manage and sell private market investments.
   

  

 Our team is composed of a diverse and international group of individuals who bring creativity, energy and excellence to every situation. We offer a fun and dynamic scale-up atmosphere, paired with the resources and stability of a mature organization, allowing for a rapid path from concept to implementation.
   

  

**What You Will Do At Royc**
* Lead experience design and help set strategy by evaluating and identifying the intersection of business needs, customer needs, and technical opportunities
* Partner closely with product management, tech and customer teams in exploring, planning, verifying, and building solutions
* Construct compelling artifacts (wireframes, conceptual diagrams, task flows, storyboards, presentations, etc.) that outline present conditions and proposed solutions to gain strategic alignment and encourage innovation within and across the organization
* Plan and conduct customer research activities throughout the project lifecycle, including collaborative sessions with customers and development partners to validate designs and make iterative improvements
* Participate in the continuous improvement of customer experience tools and processes, and scalable experience design standards
* Visualize and prototype intended solutions at various levels of fidelity, from high-level wireframes or mock-ups to conceptual presentations to highly technical documents and diagrams


**Why you are a fit for Royc**
* 4+ years of related professional user experience design and customer research experience
* Demonstrated ability to work collaboratively with experience in leading cross-functional teams in problem definition and analysis, understanding customer workflows, creating prototypes and designs that solve customer problems
* Ability to visualize and prototype intended solutions at various levels of fidelity, from high-level wireframes or mock-ups to conceptual presentations to highly technical documents and diagrams
* Ability to present designs to a wide range of audiences, including software development, quality assurance, learning content development, marketing, sales, and executive level stakeholders
* Up-to-date expertise in human-centered design best practices
* Experience with designing and conducting customer research using various methods, including interviewing, contextual inquiry, usability testing, etc.
* Excellent visual and verbal communication skills with the ability to distill complex ideas, and large amounts of data and viewpoints, to their essence


**Benefits**
* Competitive compensation structure including bonus scheme
* Health benefits including fitness allowance
* Hybrid working environment
* Work with the best in the industry


**What's ROYCs Culture**
 We have a flexible working environment where you would work closely with people pushing the boundaries of the wealth-tech space . If you like to innovate and use modern design principles and want to avoid slow decisions, you would fit well here. We building with some of Europe's best investors from the last decade and aim to have fun whilst expanding the capabilities of our products.
   

  

**Why ROYC is a fit for You!**
 We are a diverse multi-disciplinary and international team of people who bring creativity, energy, and excellence to every situation. It's a fun start-up atmosphere in a scale-up environment with a short path from idea to action. We offer flexibility, lovely breakfasts, fun team activities and after works, the maximum legal wellness allowance and actively support work-life balance.
   

  

**Interested?**
 This is a full-time, permanent position based in Stockholm. We are reviewing applications on a rolling basis. While the start date is flexible, the right candidate can join us immediately.
   

  

 ROYC celebrates diversity and does not discriminate based on ethnicity, religion, national origin, gender, sexual orientation, age, disability status, or any other applicable characteristics protected by law.

title: UX-writer!
description:
While strong copywriting skills are important, this position is specifically focused on UX writing, multimedia content creation, and content management. You’ll handle updates and improvements that extend beyond traditional copywriting, utilizing new technologies to make our clients content both engaging and accessible.
 


 Apply here!
 
  

**City :**
 Stockholm
 



  

**Job Category :**
 IT
 



  

**Extent :**
 Full time
 



  

**Start date :**
 As agreed
 



  

**Type of work :**
 Staffing
 



  

**Other :**
 Possibility to work remote
   




**About the role**

 As a UX writer you will be a key part of a small content team within Digital&IT, working to enhance our clients digital channels. They are evolving their digital experience and exploring new content types to create engaging, easy-to-understand information for their customers using multimedia formats such as images, video, and potentially other interactive content. You will play an essential role in transforming how they present (sometimes complex) information with their users, collaborating closely with design and digital product teams to deliver clear, intuitive, and interactive content for their customers
   




**Work tasks**
  
* Write clear and concise user-interface content in English.
  
* Create and integrate multimedia content (images, videos, animations) to improve clarity and engagement.
  
* Ensure all content follows accessibility requirements
  
* Review and proofread texts for grammar, spelling, and style
  
* Optimize content for user experience, conversion, and SEO using customer data and insights
  
* Maintain consistency in messaging and clarity across all website content.
  
* Manage and update and translate content through a headless CMS.
  
* Collaborate with design, product teams, the brand department, and stakeholders to create and integrate multimedia content (images, videos, animations) to improve clarity and engagement.
  

  


**We are looking for**
  
* Strong proficiency in English (and potentially other languages) with exceptional grammatical and stylistic sense.
  
* 2-4 years of professional experience with writing UX copy and product/service content
  
* Basic skills in image editing (e.g., Photoshop) and familiarity with creating visual content.
  
* Ability to integrate multimedia formats (video, images, animations) to make information more engaging.
  
* Experience in language reviewing and proofreading
  
* Familiarity with headless CMS platforms (Contentful or similar)
  
* Familiarity with Figma for writing and collaborating with stakeholders and designers
  
* Detail-oriented with a focus on clarity, consistency, and user-centered content.
  


  


 Education
 


  

  
* Relevant education within digital marketing, multimedia design or a related field.
  
* Bachelor Degree in Marketing, Media, IT, ecommerce or similar is advantageous
  


  


  

**It is meritorious if you have**



  

  
* Fluency in one or more Scandinavian languages (or other languages)
  
* Basic knowledge of SEO principles and accessibility requirements
  
* Experience in the travel industry or familiarity with travel related content.
  
* Interest or experience in creating storyboards, scripts, and interactive content formats.
  
* Experience working with video-editing software or animation tools
  


  


  

**As a person:**



  

  
* You are curious and eager to explore new technologies
  
* You have an eye for details and a passion for creating user friendly content
  
* You’re both an independent self-starter as well as a strong team player
  
* You have strong communication skills and enjoy giving and receiving feedback
  
* You’re passionate about travel and motivated to enhance the digital travel experience for customers.
  


  

  

**Our recruitment process**
  


 This recruitment process is handled by Academic Work and it is our client’s wish that all questions regarding the position is directed to Academic Work.
 


  


 Our selection process is continuous and the advert may close before the recruitment process is completed if we have moved forward to the next phase. The process includes two tests: one personality test and one cognitive test. The tests are tools to find the right talent for the right position, to enable equality, diversity, and a fair process.
   




**Become a part of Academic Work**

 When you apply to this job, you are becoming one of many consultants at Academic Work. This means that not only will you gain fantastic benefits, but also a team of consultant managers to support you through your career with us.
 


 Read more about Academic Work
   

**Do you have questions about this job?**

 Fanny Steisjö or a colleague in the recruitment team will gladly answer you on stv2@academicwork.se Please specify advert-ID in your email: 15107405

description:

title: Senior UX Designer - Design System
description:
**Let's create the future together.**
 At Volvo Cars, we believe that being curious and truly committed to understanding people is the key to future success. We are people who care about other people, working together to create new technologies and innovations for safe, sustainable and convenient mobility. Want to join us?
   

  

**User Experience**
 We are seeking a Senior UX Designer for Design System to join our team, dedicated to developing and maintaining a world-class design system tailored for enterprise web applications. As a key player in our design team, you will be responsible for creating scalable, cohesive, and high-quality design solutions that enhance user experience across our extensive product suite. You will keep track of trends and provide inspiration and vision to the UX team. In your role, you will collaborate closely with cross-functional teams to ensure our design systems are on brand, highly functional, accessible, and maintainable.
   

  

 What you’ll do:
   

  

 In this role, you will take ownership of the design system, driving it’s evolution to meet the dynamic needs of our users and business. You will work on everything from creating reusable components that streamline the design and development process to design guidelines and recommendations. Your expertise will also be key in supporting other designers with adoption and contribution to the system.
   

  

 Besides the responsibility for the enterprise design system, you will be contributing to the visual identity and UI consistency for applications built on our new enterprise platform, Connect.
   

  

 Key Responsibilities:
   

  

* Enterprise design system development: Guide the creation and implementation of a robust design system that supports complex enterprise web applications. Ensure the system is scalable, flexible, and easy to use across multiple scenarios and use cases.
* Visual identity and design system for in-store digital: Key contributor in UX visual alliance. Driving the discovery, direction and creation of visual identity and guidelines tailored for in-store products as part of the alliance community. Ensure scalability, flexibility, and easy of use across use cases and touch-points.
* Cross-functional collaboration: Work closely with UX/UI designers, developers, product managers, and other stakeholders to create a seamless and consistent user experience. Facilitate effective communication between design and development teams to ensure alignment.
* Component design and documentation: Design and maintain a library of reusable UI components and patterns. Document design choices and guidelines to ensure clarity and consistency across the team.
* Accessibility and inclusivity: Integrate accessibility standards into the design system, ensuring that all components are inclusive and meet WCAG guidelines. Advocate accessibility throughout the design process.
* Support and advocacy: Support other designers and promote the adoption of the design system within the organization. Advocate for design system methodologies and encourage a culture of continuous improvement and innovation.
* Continuous improvement: Regularly assess and refine the design system to accommodate new requirements and technological advancements. Stay up to date with industry trends and incorporate best practices into the system.


 Who you are:
   

  

* Proven experience in user experience, product, or visual design, with a strong focus on creating and evolving design systems for enterprise environments.
* Extensive experience in a design systems role, with a proven history of designing, building, and maintaining large-scale design systems.
* Experience in working with UX/ UI for large touch-screens and tablets.
* Expert-level knowledge of design tools such as Figma (mastering Figma’s latest techniques to build a scalable design system and bring the components closer to front-end code), along with experience in design token management and automation tools (e.g., Token Studio, GitHub, Frontify).
* Good understanding of front-end development principles and technologies, including CSS, React, and other relevant frameworks.
* Significant UI/UX design skills with a keen eye for detail and interest in creating clean, modern interfaces.
* Effective communication and collaboration skills, with the ability to engage effectively with a diverse range of teams and stakeholders.
* Strategic thinking and problem-solving abilities, capable of translating complex business needs into creative design solutions.
* Patience and interest in supporting designers, elevating the craft, and driving quality in every aspect of the design process.
* Ability to work effectively in a distributed team environment, facilitating asynchronous collaboration.
* A proactive mindset with the ability to identify and address patterns and opportunities for improvement within the organization.


 Location
   

  

 Stockholm Tech Hub or Gothenburg HQ.
   

  

 Application
   

  

 Applicants must provide a portfolio of work as part of their application.
   

  

 Who are we?
   

  

 Everything we do starts with people. Our purpose is to provide freedom to move, in a personal, sustainable and safe way. We are committed to simplifying our customers’ lives by offering better technology solutions that improve their impact on the world and bringing the most advanced mobility innovations to protect them, their loved ones and the people around them.
   

  

 Volvo Cars’ continued success is the result of a collaborative, diverse, and inclusive working environment. The people of Volvo Cars are committed to making a difference in our world. Today, we are one of the most well-known and respected car brands, with over 40,000 employees across the globe. We believe in bringing out the best in each other and harnessing the true power of people. At Volvo Cars your career is designed around your talents and aspirations so you can reach your full potential. Join us on a journey of a lifetime as we create safety, autonomous driving and electrification technologies of tomorrow.

title: iOS Developer Intern
description:
**XR Solutions** 
 is a technology based company that utilizes machine learning and powerful research-based optimizations to provide practical, reliable and optimizing augmented reality solutions to industrial companies.
 



 We believe that our AR technology can change working methods, the way of thinking and enable new innovative solutions that previously was not achievable in industry and machine operation.
 



  





**Role Overview:** 




 We are seeking a passionate and dedicated IOS Developer Intern to join our team for an Internship. This is an exciting opportunity for someone looking to gain hands-on experience in frontend development and XR within a fast-paced and supportive environment.
 



 As an IOS Developer Intern at XR Solutions, you will work closely with our developers.
 



  





**Required Skills:** 



* Proficient in using Xcode - mainly oriented on SwiftUI.
* Perfect understanding of async/await, actors and multithreading.
* Experience utilizing APIs in Swift code.
* Ability to implement clean and structured SwiftUI Views according to Figma designs.
* Basic understanding of UX/UI designs methods.
* Proficiency using Git tools (GitHub, Bitbucket) in team environment.
* An ability to easily communicate and work with others in teams, both with colleagues and customers.
* A self-propelled working method.
* A user-focused mindset – a passionate drive for understanding and meeting user needs.
* Open mindset to try new working methods and software tools that just launched on the market.
* Experience with ARKit/RealityKit
 *(Meritorious).*
* Aware of latest features that Swift language adds like SwiftData, Observation, SwiftTest
 *(Meritorious).*



  





**Tools & Technologies:** 



* Development Tools: Xcode, ARkit, Hoppscotch, Unity.
* Cloud & DevOps: AWS (Amazon Web Services), CI/CD pipelines.
* Project Management: Jira for task management and collaboration.
* Communication: Slack for team communication and coordination.



  





**What You’ll Gain and work with:** 



* Hands-on experience in frontend development.
* Exposure to industry best practices in software development and XR Space.
* Opportunity to work on real-world projects and contribute to innovative solutions.
* Valuable insights into working in a fast-paced, collaborative environment.
* Conduct research on technology solutions.
* Designing, developing, and testing UI for mobile and XR applications
* Solving market challenges together with the team with our groundbreaking product.



  





 If you’re excited about this opportunity and eager to learn, please send your resume outlining your interest in the position. We look forward to helping you grow your skills and advance your career in backend development.
 



  





 This is a unpaid internship initially

title: Web Analyst to Axel Johnson International
description:
*Do you have knowledge of web development technologies such as HTML, CSS and JavaScript? Are you proficient in Google Tag Manager, Google Ads Data Hub and Google Analytics? If you also want to be part of an international and successful company within IT, then we suggest you keep reading!* 




  





**About the position** 




 Perido is now helping our Axel Johnson International to find a Web Analyst to strengthen their team. The position is based at their headquarters in central Stockholm. The role requires close collaboration with various business units and may involve some travel within Europe.
 



  





 Axel Johnson International is a privately owned Swedish industrial group operating globally. The group has a dedicated long-term approach to ownership, emphasizing sustainable progress and collaboration. The focus lies on acquisitions and the development of companies, specializing in technical components and industrial solutions. The group consists of more than 200 companies and employs 5,700 people in 34 countries with ~2 bn EUR in sales, organized into six business groups, each focusing on selected niche markets. Axel Johnson International is a part of the Swedish family-owned corporate group, Axel Johnson.
 



  





 Axel Johnson International has a value-driven, entrepreneurial culture and with a long-term approach and financially stable platform as their base, they invest in talent across the group to enable our people and companies to develop, grow and thrive. The employees are their most valuable resource, and they are committed to an inclusive working environment and diverse work force that values and empowers employees of all backgrounds and experiences.
 



 The core values are evident in everything that they do and are an important guide for the companies and employees: Being far-sighted – Making things happen – Being good to work with.
 




 www.axinter.com
 




  





**Your daily tasks** 




 As a Web Analyst, you will be part of the Data Analytics team within central group IT, focusing on managing and optimizing website analytics. Your role involves presenting website data in a clear manner to support decision-making and advising on strategies to drive web traffic. You’ll work with digital tools, primarily Google Analytics, to integrate data from multiple sources and create insightful visualizations and reports. Additionally, you’ll contribute to Business Intelligence initiatives to enhance support for local portfolio companies. Responsibilities include managing digital analytics projects, configuring tracking systems, conducting data analysis, and providing training and support to users across the organization.
 



  





**Your characteristics** 




 To be successful in this role, we see that you have a strong command of English, both written and spoken, and possess excellent analytical and communication skills. Being a humble team player with keen attention to detail is essential. The role requires a good understanding of business logic and the ability to present and educate in an intuitive manner. The ideal candidate is structured, organized, and willing to travel internationally based on business needs.
 



 You will be part of an international work environment with a multitude of exciting career options!
 



  





 Does this sound exciting?
 



 We look forward to reading your application!
 



  





**Qualifications:** 



* 3-5 years of relevant work experience
* Knowledge of web development technologies (HTML, CSS, JavaScript )
* Experience with Google Cloud Platform, such as BigQuery, ML and cloud storage
* Experience and understanding of BI developments, such as Data Warehouse, Data Modelling, ETL Processes, Data Management an UX/UI Design
* Ability to translate business requirements into technical solutions
* Experience in managing projects and coordinating with multiple stakeholders
* Proficiency in Google Tag Manager, Google Ads Data Hub and Google Analytics
* Excellent communication skills, both spoken and written



  





**Meritorious** 



* Experience with Microsoft Azure/Fabric/365, DAX and SQL



  





**Contract type and hours** 




 Full-time, until further notice. Start as soon as possible.
 



  





**Application** 




 Please apply on our website
 
 perido.se/lediga-jobb/
 
 . Click on the apply button in the job ad and fill in your information and attach your CV. We recommend that you submit your application as soon as possible as selection is ongoing. Note that certain information regarding the assignment and/or the client company may have been deliberately disclosed from the advertisement. If your profile matches what we are looking for, the responsible recruiter will give you all the information you need.
 



  





**About Perido** 




 Why are we called Perido? It is from the Latin word Peridoneus which means “well matched”. Matching our consultant’s competence and career focus with our clients’ needs is what we do best! Perido is a consulting and recruitment company in the white-collar sector that helps you to the next step in your career and our vision is for everyone to thrive and be engaged at work. We have grown steadily since the start in 2003 and have over 1500 employees across the country, of which about fifty works at our offices in Stockholm and Gothenburg. As a Perido consultant, you become an important part of our organization and you grow together with us by strengthening our clients’ organizations with your skills. Please visit our website
 
 www.perido.se
 
 for more information.

title: Data Engineer
description:
**About the Role:**  

**The role:** Data Engineer
  
  

**Data Engineer Position Profile:** Osttra's AI & Analytics team is seeking a highly skilled Data Engineer with 3-5 years of experience to join our growing team in Stockholm, Sweden. You will play a critical role in building and maintaining our data platform in Google Cloud Platform (GCP), which supports a wide range of AI and BI initiatives across the organization. The ideal candidate will have a strong understanding of data engineering principles and hands-on experience with GCP and Python.
  
  

**Key Responsibilities :**  

Design, develop, and maintain scalable data pipelines using GCP services (BigQuery, Cloud Run, Google Cloud Storage, etc.)
  
Collaborate with data scientists and analysts to understand data requirements and deliver high-quality data solutions
  
Implement data quality checks and monitoring to ensure data accuracy and reliability
  
Optimise data processing for efficiency and cost-effectiveness
  
Contribute to the development of our overall data architecture and strategy
  
Design and implement infrastructure as code using tools like Terraform
  
  

**What We're Looking For:**  

**Basic Qualifications:**  

Bachelor's or Master's degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field
  
3-5 years of experience in data engineering, with a focus on GCP
  
Experience with IaC and provisioning of infrastructure as code in a cloud environment.
  
Strong proficiency in Python and SQL
  
Experience with data modelling, Container platforms, ETL/ELT processes, and data warehousing
  
Familiarity with machine learning concepts and workflows is a plus
  
Excellent communication and problem-solving skills
  
Proficient in using version control systems (e.g., Git), CI/CD pipelines, and testing frameworks
  
Demonstrated interest or experience in financial markets
  
  

**Benefits:**  

Competitive salary and benefits package
  
Opportunity to work on cutting-edge AI and BI projects
  
Work with a talented and supportive team
  
Chance to make a real impact on the financial industry
  
  

About OSTTRA
  
  

Candidates should note that OSTTRA is an independent firm, jointly owned by S&P Global and CME Group. As part of the joint venture, S&P Global provides recruitment services to OSTTRA - however, successful candidates will be interviewed and directly employed by OSTTRA, joining our global team of more than 1,200 post trade experts.
  
  

OSTTRA was formed in 2021 through the combination of four businesses that have been at the heart of post trade evolution and innovation for the last 20+ years: MarkitServ, Traiana, TriOptima and Reset. OSTTRA is a joint venture, owned 50/50 by S&P Global and CME Group.
  
With an outstanding track record of developing and supporting critical market infrastructure, our combined network connects thousands of market participants to streamline end to end workflows - from trade capture at the point of execution, through portfolio optimization, to clearing and settlement.
  
Joining the OSTTRA team is a unique opportunity to help build a bold new business with an outstanding heritage in financial technology, playing a central role in supporting global financial markets.
  
  

Learn more at www.osttra.com .
  
  

What’s In It For You?
  
  

**Benefits:**  

We take care of you, so you can take care of business. We care about our people. That’s why we provide everything you—and your career—need to thrive at S&P Global.
  
  

**Our benefits include:**  

**Health & Wellness:** Health care coverage designed for the mind and body.
  
  

**Flexible Downtime:** Generous time off helps keep you energized for your time on.
  
  

**Continuous Learning:** Access a wealth of resources to grow your career and learn valuable new skills.
  
  

**Invest in Your Future:** Secure your financial future through competitive pay, retirement planning, a continuing education program with a company-matched student loan contribution, and financial wellness programs.
  
  

**Family Friendly Perks:** It’s not just about you. S&P Global has perks for your partners and little ones, too, with some best-in class benefits for families.
  
  

**Beyond the Basics:** From retail discounts to referral incentive awards—small perks can make a big difference.
  
**For more information on benefits by country visit:** https://spgbenefits.com/benefit-summaries
  
  

-----------------------------------------------------------
  
  

Equal Opportunity Employer
  
S&P Global is an equal opportunity employer and all qualified candidates will receive consideration for employment without regard to race/ethnicity, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, age, disability, marital status, military veteran status, unemployment status, or any other status protected by law. Only electronic job submissions will be considered for employment.
  
  

If you need an accommodation during the application process due to a disability, please send an email to: EEO.Compliance@spglobal.com and your request will be forwarded to the appropriate person.
  
  

**US Candidates Only:** The EEO is the Law Poster http://www.dol.gov/ofccp/regs/compliance/posters/pdf/eeopost.pdf describes discrimination protections under federal law.
  
  

----------------------------------------------------------- 20 - Professional (EEO-2 Job Categories-United States of America), BSMGMT203 - Entry Professional (EEO Job Group)
  
  

**Job ID:** 307580
  
**Posted On:** 2024-09-27
  
**Location:** Stockholm, Sweden

title: Förvaltningsledare IT
description:
Kommunledningskontoret
**Om tjänsten**
---------------


Kalmar kommunkoncern växer i snabb takt och vi behöver därför en förvaltningsledare med uppdraget att vidareutveckla vår användning av Microsoft 365. Det här är en viktig och mångsidig roll som kräver stor förståelse för både organisationens behov och för hur IT:s förutsättningar ser ut.
Tjänsten är placerad på IT-verksamhetens enhet för utveckling och förvaltning. På enheten finns olika roller och befattningar - dels de som jobbar nära verksamheten, dels de som jobbar tekniskt inriktat med bland annat systemintegration, datalager, RPA och e-tjänster. Mixen av roller gör att vi tillsammans har en bra förståelse för de behov och utmaningar som våra verksamheter har, och kan ta fram lösningar som matchar verksamheternas behov på ett effektivt sätt.
Som förvaltningsledare IT leder du och tar ansvar för IT:s arbete med Microsoft 365. Det betyder att dina ansvarsområden är att:
• ansvara för övergripande hantering av komponenterna i Microsoft 365
• upprätta och aktivt jobba med förvaltningsplanen för Microsoft 365, tillsammans med
 verksamhetens systemförvaltare
• hålla samman en arbetsgrupp på IT med specialister inom Microsoft 365
• ha ett tätt och lyhört samarbete med kontaktpersoner på verksamhetssidan, förstå behoven och ta
 hand om verksamhetens IT-krav på Microsoft 365
• tillsammans med verksamhetens systemförvaltare hålla ihop och stötta koncernens nätverk av
 superanvändare för Microsoft 365
• bevaka nya releaser och funktioner inom Microsoft 365 för att i nära samarbete med
 verksamhetens systemförvaltare säkerställa att vi nyttjar dessa på ett smart sätt
• följa upp och säkerställa att förvaltningen av vår basinfrastruktur är stabil, säker och
 kostnadseffektiv
• fungera som intern beställare för tekniska uppgifter och resurser på IT
• ta fram riktlinjer och beslutsunderlag till IT-avdelningens ledningsgrupp
• projektleda interna projekt och uppdrag vid behov.


**Din profil**
--------------


Vi letar efter dig som har jobbat med Microsoft 365 och SharePoint på en teknisk och taktisk nivå, med fokus på att omvärldsbevaka, förvalta och utveckla. Vi tror att du har erfarenhet av ledarskap och av att driva IT-projekt framåt.
För att lyckas i rollen behöver du ha god samarbetsförmåga och vara relationsskapande. Du är lyhörd och att du har intresse, vilja och förmåga att hjälpa andra. I nära dialog med verksamheten identifierar du behov, som du sedan prioriterar och strukturerar i kravställningar på Microsoft 365 till teamet på IT. Du är en person som anstränger dig för att leverera lösningar och trivs när du får arbeta med att planera, organisera och prioritera arbetet.
Som ledare för teamet med tekniska specialister och som frontperson för IT:s arbete med Microsoft 365 är det viktigt att du är kommunikativ. Du skapar engagemang genom dialog, ger och söker återkoppling och uppfattas som öppen och närvarande.
Kompetenskrav:
• Teknisk erfarenhet och drift av SharePoint och M365-komponenter
• Erfarenhet av processtyrt arbete
Extra meriterande:
• Projektledning inom IT, PPS
• Tekniskt arbete med basinfrastruktur
• Certifieringar kopplade till M365
• Systemförvaltningsmodell-arbete, tex PM3
Till denna rekrytering använder vi oss av löpande rekrytering, dvs att tjänsten kan komma att tillsättas innan sista ansökningsdag så skicka in din ansökan redan idag!


Vad roligt att du är intresserad av att jobba hos oss! Då värderar du förmodligen, precis som vi, ett jobb som är viktigt på riktigt. Här på Kalmar kommun arbetar vi tillsammans för att hela tiden göra Kalmar ännu bättre - för alla som lever sina liv här, driver företag eller besöker vår fina kommun.
Kommunledningskontoret är kommunstyrelsens och kommunfullmäktiges förvaltning. Kontoret är även förvaltning åt integration- och arbetsmarknadsnämnden samt vatten- och miljönämnden.
Vi arbetar med ett helhetsperspektiv, nära den politiska ledningen, med målet att på bästa sätt ge stöd och service till Kalmar kommuns politiska organisation, bolag samt förvaltningar och till allmänheten. Kommunledningskontoret består drygt 300 medarbetare inom 14 olika verksamheter. Kommunledningskontoret arbetar inom ett brett spektrum av områden och förvaltningen har flera tjänster med specialistkompetenser. Dessutom arbetar förvaltningen aktivt med trygghetsfrågor, föreningsliv och civilsamhälle. Vi är en förvaltning i ständig utveckling - allt för att göra Kalmar ännu lite bättre. Välkommen till oss!

  


**Anställningen**
-----------------


**Omfattning**
Heltid
**Anställningsform**
Tillsvidareanställning
**Antal tjänster**
1
**Ansökningsinformation**
-------------------------


**Sista ansökningsdatum**
2024-10-20
**Referensnummer**
C210541

**Kontakt**
-----------


**Jonas Stockhaus**
Enhetschef IT
010-35 20 204
### **Fackliga företrädare**


**Jonas Persson**
Vision (arbetsplatsombud)
010-35 20 256
**Övrig information**
---------------------


Kalmar kommun kontrollerar identitet och arbetstillstånd innan någon anställs. Detta innebär att du som söker jobb hos oss behöver visa legitimation. Om det är aktuellt kan du även behöva visa upp ditt uppehålls- och arbetstillstånd. Vi undanber oss erbjudanden och försäljningssamtal om annonserings- och rekryteringshjälp i samband med denna tjänst.

title: IT-Infrastrukturtekniker
description:
Vi är stolta över Trollhättans Stads över 5 000 medarbetare, som varje dag gör en positiv skillnad i våra invånares liv och är med och utvecklar stadens hållbarhet och livskraft. Vi drivs och motiveras av ledorden Mod, Delaktighet, Nytänkande och Handlingskraft. Här finns en spännande utveckling där du kan vara med och göra vår stad ännu bättre.

**Beskrivning**  

Kontoret för digitalisering och IT i Trollhättans Stad söker en ny IT-infrastrukturtekniker till IT-enheten. Trollhättans Stad är inne i en mycket spännande period där vi arbetar hårt för att på bästa sätt utnyttja digitaliseringens möjligheter. Det är många spännande projekt som ska genomföras och vi söker nu dig som vill vara med och vidareutveckla vår IT-miljö så att den kan möta morgondagens behov. En mycket viktig komponent i detta arbete är identitetshantering.


På IT-enheten får du arbeta tillsammans med fantastiska, roliga och kreativa kollegor. Vi jobbar tillsammans och vi hjälper varandra för att lösa uppgifterna, ofta med glimten i ögat. Trollhättans Stad kan erbjuda dig ett spännande och varierande arbete med frihet under ansvar.

**Arbetsuppgifter**  

Ditt arbete som IT- infrastrukturtekniker innebär att vara en del av servergruppen som har i uppgift att hantera drift, support och vidareutveckling av Trollhättans Stads IT-infrastruktur. Trollhättans Stads servermiljö bygger på en virtualiseringsplattform från VMware. Serveroperativsystemen är i huvudsak Windows Server men det förekommer även en del Linuxbaserade servers. Du kommer att jobba enskilt, i mindre grupper och i projektform. Du kommer att få ett huvudansvar i Trollhättans Stads IT-miljö för ett antal IT-tekniska arbetsområden.

**Dina arbetsuppgifter**  

* Du samarbetar med dina kollegor inom IT-enheten för att på bästa sätt skapa innovativa och stabila IT-lösningar.
* Du arbetar i projekt och kan vid behov driva mindre IT-tekniska projekt inom dina ansvarsområden tillsammans med dina kollegor.
* Du genomför strukturerade testningar av dina IT-lösningar för bästa kvalité av din IT-leverans.
* Du dokumenterar ditt arbete och ser systemdokumentation som självklart.
* Du kommer att ha en viktig roll för att IT-tekniskt hantera ett antal IT-system i verksamheten.
* Du har högt fokus på 100 % kundnöjdhet.
* Du kommer att som ansvarig ge support, hantera drift och vidareutveckla ett antal IT-tekniska områden.

Tjänsteresor kan förekomma i arbetet.


Trollhättans stad erbjuder t.ex. eget kontor central i Trollhättan, friskvårdstimme, friskvårdsbidrag, försäkringar, möjlighet till fler semesterdagar samt flexibel arbetstid.

**Kvalifikationer**  

Du har högskoleutbildning inom IT-området eller motsvarande erfarenhet som arbetsgivaren bedömer likvärdig. Du kanske nyss har avslutat din utbildning och ser fram emot att nu börja använda dina kunskaper eller du arbetar idag på en IT-avdelningen i en motsvarande roll. Du pratar och skriver flytande svenska.


IT-tekniska kunskaper/ansvarsområden  

* Identitetshantering (MIM-Microsoft Identity Manager)
* Integrationer
* Microsoft 365
* IT-tekniskt stöd verksamhetssystem

Meriterande  

* Powershell, SQL och C#
* Google Workspace
* Sharepoint

Vi undanber oss alla erbjudanden om annonserings- och rekryteringshjälp i samband med denna annons! Trollhättan är en stark och attraktiv kommun som ska bli större. I dag har vi passerat 59 000 invånare och vi har siktet inställt på att växa till 70 000 trollhättebor. Inom Trollhättans Stad arbetar vi med att skapa förutsättningar för detta. Vi är över 5 000 medarbetare och våra 350 olika yrken bidrar på olika sätt med att ge service och underlätta en bra vardag för våra invånare - nu och i framtiden. Vi ser mångfald som en styrka som berikar vår verksamhet och välkomnar sökande med olika bakgrund. Trollhättans Stad tillämpar rökfri arbetstid.


Anställningsform: tillsvidareanställning | Anställningens omfattning: heltid | Antal lediga befattningar: 1 | Sysselsättningsgrad: 100% | Ort: Trollhättan | Län: Västra Götalands län | Land: Sweden | Referensnummer: 2024/300 | Kontakt: Jens Röör, IT-Chef 0520-495533, | Facklig företrädare: Vision 0520-497850, Nås via Stadens Kontaktcenter 0520-495000, | Publicerat: 2024-09-27 | Sista ansökningsdag: 2024-10-15

title: IT-arkitekt för Syntronics globala IT-miljö
description:
Syntronic växer så det knakar och lika så vår centrala IT-avdelning som är lokaliserad på vårt huvudkontor i Gävle. Vill du vara med på resan och utveckla vår IT-funktion?

**Som IT-arkitekt hos oss kommer du:**  

Att ingå i vår IT/IS-avdelning, och ansvara över vår globala IT infrastruktur. Ingen dag är den andra lik och du kommer få stora möjligheter att påverka hur vår globala IT-tjänst ska se ut. Som IT-arkitekt kommer du arbeta mycket med planering och design av vår globala IT-miljö, såväl som ett stöd för våra utvecklingsprojekt där det gäller att hitta bra lösningar som funkar för alla aktörer, interna användare såväl som kunders krav.


Som ISO27001 certifierade har vi ett stort fokus på vår informations och driftsäkerhet.


**I arbetet som IT-arktiekt ingår att:**

* Ansvara för övergripande arkitektur och vara kravställare för våra plattformar och applikationer så att dom utvecklas enligt vår verksamhetsstrategi och i linje med våra säkerhetskrav bland annat ISO27001.
* Designa lösningsförslag för att möta nya krav på vår IT-Miljö.
* Vara uppdaterad gällande att de tekniska lösningarna som tas fram är kostnadseffektiva och säkerställda enligt branschens best praxis.
* Vara delaktig i skapandet av beslutsunderlag för tekniska vägval och nya investeringar.
* IT-support samt mentor till internationella it-funktioner, från HQ är vi ansvariga globalt för IT och samarbetar tätt med lokal IT globalt.
* Drift och underhåll gällande IT-system och nätverk.
* Omvärldsbevakning av informationssäkerhetslägen och sårbarheter i system.


Vi ser det som en självklarhet att du är en flexibel person som stöttar upp vid behov där det behövs.


**Vi söker en IT-arkitekt som**:

* Har gymnasieexamen eller högre utbildning inom IT
* Har minst 5 års erfarenhet av liknande roll
* Har körkort B
* Kan uttrycka dig obehindrat på svenska och engelska.
* Kan Linux server
* Kan nätverksadministration, DNS, Routing, Vlan, Trådlösa nät, Brandväggar
* Kan Databas-server


Det är meriterande om du erfarenhet av tex Windows server, Azure, MS365, Sharepoint, Incident- och patchmanagement.

**Personliga egenskaper**  

Som IT-arkitekt på Syntronic får du hänga med härliga kollegor och vara spindeln i nätet av problemlösning. Du är utåtriktad och har en positiv inställning till arbetet, även i de mest komplexa situationerna. Du har inga problem att ta egna initiativ och är självgående i ditt arbete.

  

Syntronic erbjuder en trygg anställning i en dynamisk och framåtriktad miljö. Att vi är ett team är vår styrka, därför ser vi att du arbetar tillsammans på plats med oss på kontoret – när du inte behövs hos någon av våra kunder förstås!

**Vi erbjuder**


På Syntronic blir du en del av en härlig gemenskap där din röst hörs och dina idéer välkomnas. Vi erbjuder flexibla arbetstider, balans mellan arbete och fritid samt regelbundna karriärutvecklingssamtal och interna workshops för din utveckling. Utöver detta får du förmånliga förmåner och försäkringar. Hos oss får du inte bara ett jobb - du får en plats att växa och trivas både personligt och professionellt. Välkommen till Syntronic!

**Ansökan**


Vi ser fram emot din ansökan, som ska vara oss tillhanda senast 25 oktober. Vi arbetar med löpande urval och tjänsten kan komma att tillsättas innan sista ansökningsdag.


Av kommunikation- och kvalitetssäkringsskäl ber vi dig att skicka in din ansökan digitalt via vårt system och inte via e-post.

title: Information and Cyber Security Analyst
description:
**Since 2018, Voi has been on a mission to create safe, sustainable and reliable micromobility for everyone. Today we are the #1 e-scooter service in Europe, operating in 100 cities with over 250 MILLION rides to date. It has been an amazing journey and we have no intention of stopping now!**

At Voi, we are on a mission to revolutionize urban transportation by making cities free from pollution and congestion. Our shared electric scooters are paving the way for a cleaner, greener, and more sustainable future. As we continue to grow, security is a top priority. We are looking for an **Information and Cyber Security Analyst** to play a key role in protecting our systems, data, and customers.


In this role, you will be at the forefront of ensuring the safety and integrity of Voi's digital ecosystem. You’ll work alongside a passionate, diverse team, helping us maintain the trust of millions of riders while keeping our operations secure from cyber threats. If you're someone who thrives in a fast-paced, innovative environment and is excited about making a real impact in the micromobility space, we want to hear from you!

**Your mission at Voi:**

  

* Monitor, analyse, and respond to security alerts and incidents to protect information systems efficiently.
* Advise and support engineering, IT and other departments to implement security measures and compliance requirements.
* Document and proactively propose actions needed to strengthen our security
* Develop and maintain security policies, procedures, and documentation.
* Conduct vulnerability assessments and penetration testing to identify weaknesses and improve security posture.
* Lead specific projects such as yearly audits to ensure adherence to security standards and policies.
* Perform security reviews of third party systems
* Report security progress, risks and incidents to top management
* Ensure security awareness across the organization
* Stay updated with the latest security trends and threats to ensure best practices are applied.

 **What you need to embark**

* 2-5 years of experience in Information Security or a related field.
* Strong knowledge of security standards such as ISO 27001.
* Experience from owning information security objectives within an engineering organization
* Good knowledge of Security Information and Event Management
* Understanding of security protocols, cryptography, and network security.
* Excellent problem-solving skills and attention to detail
* Good communication skills, enabling effective interaction with technical and non-technical audiences.

**Preferred Qualifications**

* Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or a related discipline.
* Relevant certifications such as CISSP, CEH, or CISM.
* Experience in cloud security and familiarity with cloud platforms like AWS, Azure, or Google Cloud.

**WHY VOI?**  

Working at Voi is more than just a job; Our People Promise includes a personal Voiage where you will grow as a professional and be a part of a team and culture that builds something meaningful for society. In addition to this you’ll have the opportunity to:

* Join Europes #1 micromobility company
* Get “skin in the game” through our employee options program and be a part of building a world class organisation
* Work with inspiring, motivated and fun colleagues towards a common goal
* Join the micromobility-revolution and be a part of creating sustainable cities made for living, free from noise and pollution

title: Senior teknisk projektledare IT
description:
*Är du redo att leda spännande projekt och bidra till Advanias framgång? Vi söker en erfaren och Senior teknisk Projektledare till vårt nationella projektledarteam!*

**Senior teknisk projektledare på Advania**
-------------------------------------------

Inom Advanias affärsområde Managed Services Provider hjälper vi våra kunder att digitalisera sina verksamheter och optimera sina processer med hjälp av IT-tjänster och teknik. Vi är tjänstefokuserade och arbetar med allt från implementation av public och private cloud-lösningar till skräddarsydda arbetsplats- och supporttjänster som ökar effektiviteten och konkurrenskraften hos våra kunder. Vi tar hand om kundernas IT, så de kan fokusera på sin kärnverksamhet.


I rollen som Senior Teknisk Projektledare hos oss ansvarar du för att leda och genomföra komplexa IT-projekt från start till mål, med ett fokus på införandeprojekt av tjänsteavtal samt transformationsprojekt för befintliga kunder.


Det innebär att du bland annat:

* Leder projektleverans och säkerställer att projektmål uppnås inom budget och tidsramar
* Medverkar i upphandlingar och planeringsarbete inför projektstart
* Tillser att projekt planeras och leds i enlighet med etablerad metodik
* Agerar coach och bollplank till yngre kollegor

Bidrar till att utveckla Advanias projektmetoder och arbetssätt  
* 

Du blir en del av ett erfaret team av projektledare som ansvarar för samtliga projekt inom affärsområdet.

**Vad vi söker hos dig**
------------------------

För att du ska trivas och passa hos oss söker vi dig som har en gedigen bakgrund inom IT tjänsteleverans och en bred teknisk förståelse, med erfarenhet av införande av IT-tjänster. Du arbetar idag som senior teknisk Projektledare eller arkitekt. Vi tror att du motiveras av att med ett ben kvar i tekniken leda framgångsrika projekt, lösa komplexa problem och samarbeta nära både kunder, interna team och teknik. Du uppskattar en prestigefri arbetsmiljö där innovation och samarbete står i centrum, och där du aldrig är långt ifrån den dagliga leveransen.


Vi söker dig som har:

* Minst 10 års erfarenhet av att leda eller medverka i större IT-projekt, med fokus på leverans av IT-tjänster.
* Mycket god förståelse för IT-drift och tjänster inom infrastruktur, arbetsplats och support
* Dokumenterad projektledarutbildning, gärna med certifiering inom exempelvis PRINCE2, PPS eller PROPS men detta är ej ett krav.
* God kommunikationsförmåga, flytande svenska och engelska

### **Vi ser fram emot din ansökan!**

Visa gärna ditt intresse så snart som möjligt då vi intervjuar löpande. Vi välkomnar sökanden med olika bakgrunder, erfarenheter och synsätt, eftersom vi vet att en bredare mångfald berikar var och en av oss och stärker såväl effektivitet som kreativitet i vårt arbete.


Som en del av vår rekryteringsprocess genomgår våra slutkandidater en obligatorisk bakgrundskontroll, en för oss kvalitativ kontroll inför ett anställningsbeslut.


Tveka inte att höra av dig om du har några frågor eller funderingar.
company_description: Advania är ett techbolag som utformar skräddarsydda lösningar och skapar hållbara värden genom smart användning av teknik.

title: Microsoft Azure Data Engineer
description:
This will be a full time assignment until year end, thereafter it will be extended as an "on demand assignment" (16 hours/week minimum in Stockholm) and should be active and available for taking up extra effort with short notice.
  

  

**Role:**  

* We are looking for a hands-on Data Engineer with application operations and maintenance expertise focused on Microsoft Azure cloud data platform.
* Handle data platform monitoring, quality, and error handling end to end.
* Experience in handling support tickets and reporting.
* As part of the team, you will take part in some development work on a need basis (requirement analysis, design, development, test, deployment, hand over).
* Design and develop data solutions completely.
* Work closely with our business partners, system manager and help them to get better insights on the platform health and stability.
**Essential requirements:**  

* At least a bachelor’s degree within Computer Science or comparable field and you have at least 4 years’ experience in software development
* Experience in handling large cloud data platform maintenance.
* Ability to monitor data processing using integration and orchestration tools as Azure Data Factory and Databricks
* Well familiar with Microsoft Azure Data Lake, Azure SQL database and Azure Synapse data warehouse solutions
* Familiarity with Azure Monitor or Log Analytics for real-time monitoring and troubleshooting of data pipelines, ensuring optimal performance and uptime.
* Experience in continuous integration and continuous deployment (CI/CD) practices using Azure DevOps, especially for automating data pipeline deployments.
* Experience in data modeling and programming using spark SQL and TSQL
* Develop and maintain Power BI reporting and self-service solution.
* Self-motivated and self-going
* English is a must and Swedish is beneficial.
* Excellent problem solving and analytical skills.
* Strong communication and collaboration skills
* You have a hands-on mentality to solve complex issues.
* You are skilled in understanding the customer demands and can support them and build sustainable solution in IT-landscape.

  

**Please explain how you meet all the requirements** **when applying.**  

  

**Location:** Stockholm  

**Period**: ASAP - 31-12-2024  

**Last day to apply**: 06-10-2024  

We present regularly. This means that we sometimes remove the assignements from our website before the final application deadline. If you are interested in an assignement, we recommend that you submit your application as soon as possible.

title: IT Generalist (Azure och Intune)
description:
Vill du ta nästa steg i din karriär och arbeta med avancerade molnlösningar? Vi på QD söker nu en **IT-generalist** med fokus på **Azure** och **Microsoft Intune**. I denna roll kommer du att arbeta nära våra kunder för att driva, utveckla och optimera deras IT-miljöer, där tyngdpunkten ligger på molntjänster och digital transformation.


Som en viktig del av vårt team kommer du att ansvara för att designa och implementera moderna lösningar i **Azure**, samt hantera enhets- och applikationshantering via **Intune**. Du kommer att delta i allt från molnmigreringar och hybridlösningar till säkerhetsförbättringar och automatisering. Rollen innebär också att du får analysera kundernas behov och föreslå förbättringar som ökar deras effektivitet och säkerhet.


Även om ditt fokus ligger på molnplattformar, kommer du också att arbeta med andra delar av IT-miljön, där din breda erfarenhet inom IT kommer till nytta vid exempelvis integrationer och säkerhetslösningar.

**Vem du är:**


Vi tror att du har 4 – 5 års arbetslivserfarenhet inom IT-drift, med stark expertis inom **Azure** och **Intune**. Du har ett strategiskt tänkande kring molnlösningar, men också tillräcklig bredd för att kunna stötta i andra delar av IT-infrastrukturen vid behov. Din förmåga att kommunicera tekniska koncept på ett tydligt sätt gör att du trivs i kundkontakter och kan förklara lösningar på både svenska och engelska.


Du är självgående, strukturerad och drivs av att leverera högkvalitativa och effektiva IT-lösningar. Vi ser också att du har en naturlig nyfikenhet för att hålla dig uppdaterad inom den senaste tekniken.

**Vi söker dig som har erfarenhet av:**

* **Azure**: administration, design och implementering av molntjänster (IaaS, PaaS, SaaS)
* **Microsoft Intune**: hantering och administration av enheter och applikationer
* **Windows Server-miljöer**: Active Directory, DNS, DHCP
* **Microsoft 365 och Entra**: säkerhets- och identitetshantering
* **Automatisering och scriptning**: PowerShell, Azure Automation

**Meriterande om du har erfarenhet av:**

* Hybridmolnlösningar och integrationer
* Säkerhetslösningar i molnet
* Backup och återställning i molnbaserade miljöer

title: Senior Software Engineer
description:
We are a fast-growing SaaS company helping marketers make data-driven decisions by providing a platform that integrates data from over 500 sources. We’re focused on delivering a world-class user experience. We are looking for a Senior Software Engineer to join our team in Stockholm. You will play a key role in developing our platform, focusing on distributed systems, large-scale design, and architecture. This is an exciting opportunity to work closely with talented engineers and grow with us.


As part of our team, you’ll work on back-end engineering within a complex AWS microservice architecture, taking ownership of system design, deployment, and performance optimization.

**Must Haves:**


10+ years of software engineering experience


Expertise in Rust (personal or professional)


Strong knowledge of AWS, especially permissions management


Experience with system design, distributed systems, and security


Fluent in English


**Nice to Haves:**


Familiarity with Python, JavaScript/TypeScript, React


Experience with microservice architecture in AWS


Knowledge of front-end development and UI design


Hands-on experience with pair or mob programming

title: Data Engineer – AWS, Redshift
description:
looking for an experienced **Data Engineer** to strengthen our **Data & Analytics** team. You will play a key role in developing high-quality, efficient data pipelines on our **AWS-based data platform** for Finance, Compliance, and Risk. As part of an agile Data Delivery team, you’ll collaborate closely with Tech Leads, Data Analysts, Business Intelligence developers, and Product Owners to deliver scalable and innovative solutions.

**Key Responsibilities**:

* Develop and support data pipelines on our **AWS-based Data Platform**.
* Translate designs and requirements into efficient, maintainable, and reusable code.
* Automate processes wherever possible, from **CI/CD pipelines** to **data quality testing**.
* Collaborate and assist team members and stakeholders throughout the project lifecycle.
* Participate in solution design discussions and contribute to the architecture.
* Work in line with **DevOps practices**, sharing responsibilities for development, testing, deployment, and system performance.

**Key Competencies**:

* Minimum 2 years of experience with **Redshift Data Warehouse** development.
* Proficiency with AWS data technologies including **S3**, **Python**, **IAM**, **AWS Glue**, **AWS Athena**, **Spark**, **Redshift**, and **Airflow**.
* Strong skills in **SQL** and **PL/SQL**.
* Ability to conceptualize complex technical issues and understand data within a business context.

**Skills/Experience**:

* Experience in **data modeling**, particularly for **Data Warehouses**.
* Background in the **banking/financial** industry is advantageous.
* Familiarity with **Oracle RDBMS** and **Informatica** is a plus.
* Knowledge of **agile frameworks** such as **SAFe** is beneficial.

Job Type: Contract  
Contract length: 12 months

Pay: 300,00kr - 400,00kr per hour

Expected hours: 40 per week

Experience:

* Redshift Data Warehouse: 2 years (Required)
* Data Engineer: 5 years (Required)
* AWS: 2 years (Required)

Work Location: Remote

Expected Start Date: 04-10-2024

title: Data Engineer – Informatica
description:
We are looking for an experienced **Data Engineer** to strengthen our Data Delivery function within the area of **Data & Analytics**. In this role, you will play a key part in the success of delivering data products for our client. Working in an agile Data Delivery team, you will develop new and maintain existing data integrations into our **Informatica**-based data platform. **Responsibilities**:

* Design secure and reliable workflows for **staging, cleansing**, and **loading data** with high performance.
* Work closely with business stakeholders to gather requirements and translate them into solution specifications.
* Populate **ODS** and **data marts** with quality data for **Business Intelligence (BI) solutions**.
* Maintain and improve existing solutions, troubleshoot, and resolve defects.
* Support data quality routines and ensure data consistency across platforms.

**Competence and Experience Requirements**:

* Minimum **5 years of experience** in development using **Informatica PowerCenter**.
* Strong knowledge of **Datawarehouse** concepts and experience designing data warehouse solutions.

* Ability to investigate and handle **data quality issues**.

Contract length: 12 months

Pay: 300,00kr - 400,00kr per hour

Expected hours: 40 per week

Experience:

* Data Engineer: 5 years (Required)
* Informatica: 4 years (Required)
