title: Head of IAM Solutions
description:
**Job ID: 25155** 






  
 





**Would you like to lead and support a team of skilled IAM professionals with the ambition to make Nordea a more Secure bank?** 








 We are looking for a leader for leaders with extensive experience delivering and optimising Identity and access management (IAM) solutions. You will lead the IAM solutions teams delivering IGA, PAM, SSO, tools etc. This is an opportunity for the candidate who wish to transform and optimise the ways we work with our IAM solutions and further support our mission to de-risk, secure, and protect Nordea.
 





  
 





**About this opportunity** 








 Welcome to the Identity & Access Management team where we operate and transform the key Identity and Access management services, tools and processes that support Nordea’s digital landscape. We add value by designing, implementing and operating our Identity and Access Management solutions to meet what is a dynamic cyber threat and regulatory landscape.
 







 As Head of IAM Solutions, you’ll play a valuable role in delivering and optimizing our IAM products through our solution/development teams. You’ll be leading a team of skilled and motivated leaders and team members across all of our locations.
 





  
 





**What you will be doing** 
 :
 




* Continue to grow and lead our IAM solution development teams consisting of 30+ employees and 45+ consultants via your direct team leads across all locations.
* Provide strategic leadership and implement best practice Identity & Access Management standards on topics such as Identity Governance, privileged Access management, Single Sign on etc.
* Own and lead activities related to development of the systems and services delivered out of IAM, as well as have oversight of operations and maintenance of the systems we own
* Mature and maintain a common operating model for our development teams
* Perform vendor selections when relevant and implement new products/systems in the organisation
* Ensure all IAM solutions are compliant with internal and external compliance requirements
* Define project scope/requirements and oversee project deliveries out of your unit
* Create product roadmaps aligning towards a zero trust strategy and architecture
* Collaborate across the wider IAM organisation to ensure timely remediation of audit and risk and other overlapping activities
* Act as deputy for the Head of Identity & Access Management



  
 





 You’ll join a team who are passionate about IT Security and compliance - especially delivery of high-quality Identity and Access Management services. You will get the chance to help us strengthen this area. The position can be located in Helsinki, Stockholm, Gdynia or Warsaw.
 





  
 





**Who you are** 








 Collaboration. Ownership. Passion. Courage. These are the values that guide us in being at our best – and that we expect you share with us.
 







**To succeed in this role, we believe that you:** 





* Have extensive experience from a similar role working with Identity & Access Management across various disciplines and is passionate about the area
* Have experience with SailPoint IdentityIQ, CyberArk or similar products
* Have experience being a leader, and preferably have been a leader for leaders with a proven track record of team development in a geographically dispersed setting
* Are a great communicator and have a service and customer focused approach to the service you are delivering
* Have been in a similar position in the past and come with a big network within the Identity & Access management community
* Are a strong driving force, well-structured and ready to lead from the front
* Are fluent in English



  
 





 If this sounds like you, get in touch!
 





  
 





**Next steps**




 Submit your application no later than
 



 29/09/2024
 



 . For more information, you’re welcome to contact 
 
 Head of Identity & Access Management,
 
  Stine Wieben Rasmussen at 
 
 stine.wieben.rasmussen @nordea.com. Please note that interviews will be held on a rolling basis.
   

  


 At Nordea, we know that an inclusive workplace is a sustainable workplace. We deeply believe that our diverse backgrounds, experiences, characteristics and traits make us better at serving customers and communities. So please come as you are.
 





  

  



 Please be aware that any applications or CVs coming through email or direct messages will not be accepted or considered. 
 





  
 





**Only for candidates in Sweden:** 
 For union information, please contact finansforbundet@nordea.se or SACONordea@nordea.com.
 





  
 



**Only for candidates in Poland:**


 Please include permit for processing personal data in CV as following:
 







  
 







 In accordance with art. 6 (1) a and b. Regulation (EU) 2016/679 of the European Parliament and of the Council of 27 April 2016 on the protection of natural persons with regard to the processing of personal data and on the free movement of such data, and repealing Directive 95/46/EC (General Data Protection Regulation) hereinafter ‘GDPR’. I agree to have: my personal data, education and employment history proceeded for the purposes of current and future recruitment processes in Nordea Bank Abp.
 







  
 







 The administrator of your personal data is: Nordea Bank Abp operating in Poland through its Branch, address: Aleja Edwarda Rydza Śmiglego 20, 93-281 Łodź. Your personal data will be processed for the recruitment processes in Nordea Bank Abp. You have a right to access your personal data, right to rectify and right to delete. Disclosing the personal data in the scope specified by the provisions of Polish Labour Code from 26 June 1974 and executive acts are mandatory. Providing personal data is necessary to conduct the recruitment processes. The request for the deletion of your personal data means resignation from further participation in recruitment processes and causes the immediate removal of your application. Detailed information concerning processing of your personal data can be found at:  
 







 https://www.nordea.com/en/doc/nordea-privacy-policy-for-applicants.pdf
 







  
 







 We reserve the right to reply only to selected applications.

title: Frontend developer to big bank in Stockholm!
description:
This is a exciting role where you get the chance to grow and work with modern technologies as well as working at the largest financial group in the Nordic region and one of Europe's largest banks!
 


 Apply here!
 
  

**City :**
 Stockholm
 



  

**Job Category :**
 IT
 



  

**Extent :**
 Full time
 



  

**Start date :**
 According to the agreement
 



  

**Type of work :**
 Staffing
 



  

**Other :**
 Possibility to work remote
   




**About the role**

 As a Frontend developer you will be a part of our clients Platform team. You’ll join a highly capable, diverse and distributed team of senior developers spanning all the Nordics and Poland. You will be a part of a team thats provide an internal Platform as a Service in the bank. Their focus is on standardization of the software development process and CI/CD across different projects. The platform focuses on delivering on-prem Kubernetes clusters and on-prem Cloud services as well as opens up for Public cloud services.
 


  


  

**You are offered**



  

  
* You'll get the opportunity to join a team of experts and learn from senior colleagues, as well as increase your skills as a Frontend developer.
  
* The opportunity to develop and advance in your career. As well as working at a global company which value a sustainable workplace, work-life balance and a diverse workplace.
  
* A dedicated consultant manager from Academic Work who will support and coach you in your career. This is a long term assignment at our client and you'll have an ongoing employment at Academic Work.
  

  


**Work tasks**

 The team is responsible for the Portal that is the main point of contact for developers through which they use the platform. That means they deliver their own application, called Portal, based on Spotify Backstage, and this is a NodeJS and React based application. You will are work with some Python APIs, Ansible Automation backends, where you build integrations towards variety of dozens of tools in the ecosystems to make them available for developers to be used from Portal.
 


  

  
* Supporting and developing the User Interface for observability and interaction tool to manage Application Lifecycle, CICD process and Hosting Platform used by Software Developers and DevOps teams
  
* Keeping charge of visual consistency of the platform (e.g. making sure plugins developed by other teams are in line with base design and follow UX good practices)
  

  


**We are looking for**
  
* You who have work experience as a developer with good NodeJS and React skills
  
* You who have knowledge about hosting and CICD processes and toolset will be a plus (e.g. Kubernetes, Tekton, ArgoCD, Jenkins)
  
* You who have good communication skills in English (written and spoken)
  
* Swedish citizenship or a valid work permit enabling immediate start in the position.
  


  


  

**To succeed in the role, your personal skills are:**
  

 used to proactively seek knowledge, promote collaboration and sparring within a team and across teams.
   

 Are a highly innovative problem solver with strong analytical and customer service abilities.
 


  

  

**Our recruitment process**
  


 This recruitment process is handled by Academic Work and it is our client’s wish that all questions regarding the position is directed to Academic Work.
 


  


 Our selection process is continuous and the advert may close before the recruitment process is completed if we have moved forward to the next phase. The process includes two tests: one personality test and one cognitive test. The tests are tools to find the right talent for the right position, to enable equality, diversity, and a fair process.
   




**Become a part of Academic Work**

 When you apply to this job, you are becoming one of many consultants at Academic Work. This means that not only will you gain fantastic benefits, but also a team of consultant managers to support you through your career with us.
 


 Read more about Academic Work
   

**Do you have questions about this job?**

 Sofie Gillberg or a colleague in the recruitment team will gladly answer you on stv2@academicwork.se Please specify advert-ID in your email: 15107216

title: Senior Solution Architect (Nordics & Benelux)
description:
**Description**
 What makes us Qlik?
   

  

 A Gartner® Magic Quadrant™ Leader for 14 years in a row, Qlik transforms complex data landscapes into actionable insights, driving strategic business outcomes. Serving over 40,000 global customers, our portfolio leverages pervasive data quality and advanced AI/ML capabilities that lead to better decisions, faster.
   

  

 We excel in integration and governance solutions that work with diverse data sources, and our real-time analytics uncover hidden patterns, empowering teams to address complex challenges and seize new opportunities.
   

  

 The Senior Solution Architect Role
   

  

 Are you ready for a role with diverse responsibilities, constant excitement, and the opportunity to work closely with our largest regional customers and partners?
   

  

 As a Solutions Architect at Qlik, you'll be a key player in our Sales Organization, collaborating with various teams and staying at the forefront of the latest developments in the Data, Analytics, and AI market. If you thrive in a dynamic, agile work environment and are motivated by technical challenges, this position might be the perfect fit for you!
   

  

 What makes this role interesting?
   

  

* Take complete ownership of technical relationships and the sales cycle by effectively showcasing the technical and business value of Qlik's next-generation data analytics, ML/AI, and data integration platform to customers, partners, and internal teams.
* Engage with key customer stakeholders through exceptional solution presentations and custom demonstrations. Position proposed solutions to technical, end-users, operations, and senior management staff.
* Stay informed about Qlik's latest product developments and competitors in the Data, Analytics & AI market. Work closely with Sales, Marketing, Customer Success, Product, R&D, and Consulting teams.


**Here’s How You’ll Be Making An Impact**
* Technical Ownership: Demonstrate end-to-end ownership of technical relationships and the technical sales cycle.
* Sales Qualification: Contribute to the technical qualification and closure of sales opportunities, predominantly involving Qlik's Data Integration, Automated Machine Learning, and AI platform. Collaborate with colleagues to address customers' data integration and governance requirements utilizing Qlik Talend Data Integration solutions.
* Presales Activities: Engage in initiatives to boost regional revenue, delivering outstanding solution presentations and tailored demonstrations.
* Solution Positioning: Present potential solutions to stakeholders within the prospect's or Qlik partner's organization.
* Proof-of-Concept Execution: Execute Proof-of-Concepts successfully to demonstrate the value of Qlik's solutions to potential customers.
* Regional Business Development: Support regional business development activities, such as marketing events, trade shows, and partner events.
* Internal Enablement and Content Creation: Create valuable content for our team and across teams. This could include writing white papers, community articles, customer success stories, etc.


**We’re Looking For a Teammate With**
* 3-5 years of experience in a Presales, Consulting, or similar technical capacity
* Excellent communication skills to convince both business and technical audiences
* Highly driven with strong interpersonal skills.
* Proven track record of developing relationships at technical, commercial, and executive levels throughout large enterprises
* Experience in BI, data visualization, and analytics. Proficient with cloud solutions like SaaS, PaaS, and iPaaS.
* Strong knowledge of areas like Data Integration (ETL/ELT), Data Warehousing, APIs, Data Quality, and Data Governance
* Ability to work independently and manage multiple complex opportunities
* Previous experience with Data Integration products is a strong advantage.
* Proficient knowledge of web development technologies such as JavaScript, HTML5, .NET, and Python is beneficial.
* A solid understanding of Machine Learning tools and Generative AI concepts is advantageous.
* Expertise in Cloud technologies, including certifications for specific hyperscalers (AWS, Azure, GCP), is a plus.
* This position requires willingness and ability to travel.
* Fluent in one of the Nordic languages and English


 The location for this role is:
   

  

 Stockholm, Sweden
   

  

 Apply now and be a driving force in transforming the data landscape.
   

  

**More About Qlik And Who We Are**
 Find out more about life at Qlik on social: Instagram, LinkedIn, YouTube, and X/Twitter, and to see all other opportunities to join us and our values, check out our Careers Page.
   

  

 What else do we offer?
   

  

* Genuine career progression pathways and mentoring programs
* Culture of innovation, technology, collaboration, and openness
* Flexible, diverse, and international work environment


 Giving back is a huge part of our culture. Alongside an extra “change the world” day plus another for personal development, we also highly encourage participation in our Corporate Responsibility Employee Programs
   

  

 If you need assistance applying for a role due to a disability, please submit your request via accessibilityta @ qlik .com. Any information you provide will be treated according to Qlik’s Recruitment Privacy Notice. Qlik may only respond to emails related to accommodation requests.
   

  

 Qlik is not accepting unsolicited assistance from search firms for this employment opportunity. Please, no phone calls or emails. All resumes submitted by search firms to any employee at Qlik via-email, the Internet or in any form and/or method without a valid written search agreement in place for this position will be deemed the sole property of Qlik. No fee will be paid in the event the candidate is hired by Qlik as a result of the referral or through other means.
   

  

 - EMEA

title: Senior Partner Sales Manager - Enterprise Sweden
description:
**Description**
 Would you like to be part of a team that is redefining the IT industry? Amazon Web Services is leading the next paradigm shift in computing and is looking for world class candidates to help drive opportunities with our valued partner network in Sweden. You will be at the heart of key trends like artificial intelligence, machine learning, sustainability and cloud-driven industry solutions, helping customers with state-of-the-art technologies on AWS to innovate even faster.
   

  

 As Senior Partner Sales Manager in Sweden, you will build and execute a Partner go-to-market strategy for a set of customers in your territory and manage a pipeline of co-sell opportunities to reach your target. You will deliver on our strategy to help customers achieve their business objectives and accelerate adoption of Amazon’s infrastructure web services, in which Partners play a pivotal role. The ideal candidate has the ability to build effective, multi-level relationships (including C-level) with customers and partners, creating a preference for AWS.
   

  

 You will collaborate with partners to serve and create value for customers within the Enterprise segment. You will lead interactions with partners to create net new pipeline and accelerate joint customer opportunities, leveraging the benefits of the AWS Partner Program.
   

  

 As Senior Partner Sales Manager, you enjoy teamwork and building bridges. You will become an integral part of the AWS Sales Team and collaborate closely with AWS account teams, solution specialists and solution architects, as well as the Partner Development team and Marketing. You will own and execute the partner go-to-market strategy for customers in your territory.
   

  

 Are you customer obsessed, partner focused, and do you have a passion for technology? Then come build the future with us!
   

  

 Key job responsibilities
   

  

* Build the Partner Strategy for the Enterprise target markets in Sweden, in line with the AWS strategic direction.
* Define partner ecosystem and relevant partner solutions to address key customer use cases, which accelerate innovation and cloud adoption for our customers.
* Coordinate and drive execution of the business plan while working with key internal stakeholders (e.g. account teams, solution architects, business development teams, marketing, etc.).
* Manage and drive joint co-sell engagements between consulting partners, technology partners, Account Management and Partner Development team.
* Work with AWS account teams in a highly collaborative operating model to develop pipeline.
* Collaborate with partner bid desk teams to support partners on how to best leverage APN programs, solution support and pricing constructs
* Liaise with the Partner’s field sales organization, channels and end customers to help create and drive revenue opportunities for AWS.
* Ensure that AWS is the partner’s preferred cloud computing platform across all product lines.
* Prepare and lead business reviews to the senior management team.
* Provide support during contract negotiations and serve as a liaison to the legal group.


**About The Team**
 Diverse Experiences
   

  

 AWS values diverse experiences. Even if you do not meet all of the qualifications and skills listed in the job description, we encourage candidates to apply. If your career is just starting, hasn’t followed a traditional path, or includes alternative experiences, don’t let it stop you from applying.
   

  

 Why AWS?
   

  

 Amazon Web Services (AWS) is the world’s most comprehensive and broadly adopted cloud platform. We pioneered cloud computing and never stopped innovating — that’s why customers from the most successful startups to Global 500 companies trust our robust suite of products and services to power their businesses.
   

  

 Inclusive Team Culture
   

  

 Here at AWS, it’s in our nature to learn and be curious. Our employee-led affinity groups foster a culture of inclusion that empower us to be proud of our differences. Ongoing events and learning experiences, including our Conversations on Race and Ethnicity (CORE) and AmazeCon (gender diversity) conferences, inspire us to never stop embracing our uniqueness.
   

  

 Mentorship & Career Growth
   

  

 We’re continuously raising our performance bar as we strive to become Earth’s Best Employer. That’s why you’ll find endless knowledge-sharing, mentorship and other career-advancing resources here to help you develop into a better-rounded professional.
   

  

 Work/Life Balance
   

  

 We value work-life harmony. Achieving success at work should never come at the expense of sacrifices at home, which is why flexible work hours and arrangements are part of our culture. When we feel supported in the workplace and at home, there’s nothing we can’t achieve in the cloud.
   

  

**Basic Qualifications**
* Entrepreneurial “builder” mentality and proven ability to deliver results amid ambiguity and change
* Extensive experience within technology related (partner-) sales experience in Enterprise-grade customers to coordinate field teams and develop and close high-profile deals
* Experience working with Consulting companies and/or ISV and SaaS vendors
* Experience in developing detailed annual Go-to-market plans and a successful track record to achieving and exceeding quota and key performance metrics
* Effective verbal and written communications skills, fluent in Swedish and English with excellent presentation skills and ability to articulate complex concepts to cross-functional audiences - including senior executives.


**Preferred Qualifications**
* Existing network with Enterprise customers and GSI, SI, VAR, ISV and SaaS community in Sweden
* Prior experience working with Nordic AWS Consulting Partners and/or Technology partners
* Experience working within cloud solutions
* Specialization in industry verticals (for example Manufacturing, FSI, Retail)
* Understanding of AWS, cloud architecture and infrastructure


 Amazon is an equal opportunities employer. We believe passionately that employing a diverse workforce is central to our success. We make recruiting decisions based on your experience and skills. We value your passion to discover, invent, simplify and build. Protecting your privacy and the security of your data is a longstanding top priority for Amazon. Please consult our Privacy Notice (https://www.amazon.jobs/en/privacy\_page) to know more about how we collect, use and transfer the personal data of our candidates.
   

  

  

**Company** 
 - AWS EMEA SARL (Sweden Branch)
   

  

 Job ID: A2755612

title: DevOps Lead
description:
Vill du vara med och ansvara för att leda vår transformation till Cloud? Välkommen till oss som vår nya DevOps Lead!
   

  

 Vi är ett framgångsrikt produktbolag som fokuserar på att leverera en SaaS-tjänst för redovisning, ekonomi och lön till våra kunder. Sen vår start för 10+ år sedan har vi vuxit organiskt och med sunda finanser. PE är i starten på ett omfattande tekniskt initiativ och behöver förstärka vår organisation!
   

  

 På Development är vi idag cirka ca 35 kollegor som arbetar tillsammans för att driva innovation och kontinuerligt vidareutveckla vår produkt. Vi jobbar i en modern, agil utvecklingsprocess där teamen själva sätter sina milstolpar och sköter prioriteringen utifrån uppsatta affärsmål. Vi tror det är roligare att arbeta om man förstår användarnas behov och ser utmaningar och möjligheter.
   

  

**👉🏼 Om rollen**
 Som vår DevOps Lead kommer du att spela en avgörande roll i vårt team, med ansvar för att leda och utveckla vår operations-, infrastruktur-, och releaseprocesser. Du blir en nyckelspelare i att säkerställa smidighet, effektivitet och stabilitet i vårt team. Du kommer även vara ansvarig för att leda vår transformation till cloud.
   

  

**Dina Huvudsakliga Ansvarsområden Som DevOps Lead Är**
* Operations och Infrastruktur: Ansvara för övervakning, underhåll och optimering av vår infrastruktur.
* Releasehantering: Leda utvecklingen och implementeringen av automatiserade byggpipelines och säkerställa effektiva releaser.
* Metrics och Incidenthantering: Implementera och övervaka KPI:er och metrics för systemets hälsa, samt leda incidenthantering och problemlösning.
* Tekniskt Ledarskap: Agera som en mentor och ledare inom teamet, driva projekt framåt och vara proaktiv i att identifiera och åtgärda tekniska utmaningar.
* Cloud Transformation: Spela en ledande roll i vår övergång till cloud-baserade lösningar, inklusive arbete med Kubernetes och andra cloud-teknologier.
* Personalansvar: Utveckla och stödja genom mentorskap, feedback och individuell utveckling för att skapa en stimulerande och positiv arbetsmiljö.


****💙 Vem söker vi?****
 Vi söker dig som har relevant utbildning samt stark bakgrund inom DevOps, med bevisad erfarenhet av att hantera operations, infrastruktur, och releaseprocesser. Vidare tror vi att du har;
   

  

* Erfarenhet från liknade tech stack: Java, MySQL, Jenkins, Maven, ELK, Prometheus.
* Kunskap och erfarenhet av cloud-teknologier, särskilt inom cloud transformation och Kubernetes, är mycket meriterande.
* Förmågan att arbeta självständigt, ta initiativ och leda både projekt och människor.
* Stark problemlösningsförmåga och en proaktiv inställning till utmaningar.
* Utmärkta kommunikationsfärdigheter och förmågan att samarbeta effektivt inom ett team.


 Vi erbjuder en spännande roll i hjärtat av vår tekniska transformation. Vi har en dynamisk och stöttande arbetsmiljö där dina idéer och bidrag värderas högt. Du kommer få en möjlighet till professionell utveckling och tillväxt inom företaget.
   

  

 Det finns så mycket mer att berätta om både PE som bolag, vår vision att göra svenska företag mer framgångsrika, vår kultur, utvecklingsteamet, produkten m.m. Tveka inte att höra av dig om du vill veta mer! Vi ser fram emot att höra från dig!
   

  

**Önskad start:** 
 Så snart vi hittar rätt person för rollen, enligt överenskommelse. Vi går igenom urvalet löpande, så skicka gärna in din ansökan så snart som möjligt!
   

  

*Inte riktigt rätt roll för dig men nyfiken på PE som bolag? Du hittar alla våra lediga tjänster på* 
*accounting.pe/* 
 karriar, eller välkommen att höra av dig och berätta mer om dig och vart du vill som nästa steg i ditt arbetsliv!
   

  

 Vi genomför bakgrundskontroller i slutskedet av våra rekryteringsprocesser.
   

  

 Vi på PE Accounting ändrar sättet världen ser på ekonomi- och lönehantering!
   

  

 Vårt automatiserade system, i kombination med vår tjänsteleverans bildar tillsammans en helhetslösning som ger våra kunder möjligheten att outsourca sin ekonomifunktion, och samtidigt behålla 100% kontroll - i realtid.
   

  

 Vi har en stabil affärsmodell, där över 90% av intäkterna är prenumerationsbaserade. Tillväxten har skett organiskt och med sunda finanser. Vi har fått utmärkelsen DI Gasell sex år i rad och är ett värderingsstyrt bolag med stort fokus på glädje, ansvar, prestigelöshet och nyfikenhet!

title: Identity Security Architect
description:
Would you like to be a key part of our customer delivery in one of the IT industry’s most important and current areas?
   

  

 Be a part of a team where you are surrounded by experts all day, every day in a forward-thinking company with the top in sight?
   

  

 ID North offers products and services in the entire field of identity security (IAM, IGA, PAM), which is a central part of IT security. We are the leading company in Sweden and intend to further distance ourselves from the competition in the entire Nordics. We are on an exciting growth journey, which is why we are now looking for more solution developers who want to join our team and develop tomorrow’s identity security solutions for our customers!
   

  

**Your Mission** 
 📌
   

  

 As an Architect, you will be responsible for implementing solutions based on customer specifications and requirements. Together with a team of developers, you will technically lead our assignments and projects to deliver our solutions to customers. By your side, you will have project managers, experts in our field, as well as experienced and skilled developers egger to deliver.
   

  

**In your role, you will need to: 💻**
* Have the ability to discern what can be solved with standard functionality and, if necessary, design a custom solution.
* Explain identity security and concepts to customers in an educational manner.
* Possess a good understanding of information flows and how data interrelates, especially in IAM and IGA solutions.
* Be experienced in integrating Active Directory/LDAP and Web Services.
* Have experience in integrating cloud services and standards such as SAML, OpenID Connect, OAuth2, SCIM.
* It is advantageous to have knowledge and experience with Linux and Windows environments, MySQL and MSSQL databases, Java and Tomcat, Apache httpd, certificate management/SSL/TLS/PKI.
* Be familiar with version control and release management, for example, based on Subversion or Git and Ant or Maven.
* Experience with identity security products from SailPoint, Savyint, Opentext, Okta, Nexus, CyberArk, Microsoft or another technology


 There may be business trips in the role. We have offices in Stockholm, Borås, Gothenburg, Denmark and Helsinki, which means that your location can be flexible according to your needs and lifestyle.
   

  

**Your Competence 📓**
 We are looking for someone with at least three years of experience in a similar role. We see that you are well-versed and have knowledge in identity security, which is highly valued. We expect that you have actively worked in implementation projects and have good experience in translating customer needs into a suitable and sustainable solution. You have experience in an advisory role with customers and can confidently guide them with your expertise. You can communicate fluently in both Swedish and English, both spoken and written.
   

  

**Your Qualities
 **⭐️****
 The ability to capture requirements that a customer presents and design a solution with the products we work with to realize a solution according to the customer’s needs.
   

  

 We value your personal qualities and are looking for someone who is attentive, solution-oriented, has a high social competence, and is easy to collaborate with and build relationships with others. You have a focus on development, are analytical but can see things from a holistic perspective.
   

  

**We Offer 🚀**
 A strong and pleasant company at the forefront of our field, where our expertise and experience give us a competitive position. We offer development opportunities, and you will be surrounded by specialists! At ID North, you have good employment benefits, and you will become a key person for us. We enjoy each other’s company and take the opportunity to go on trips, adventures, and have fun together on our journey to the top.
   

  

 Does this sound like a position for you? We have an immediate need, so you should not hesitate to apply or send your application. Are you IN?
   

  

 Welcome- Chief Human Resources Officer Linda Öhlin

title: Data Engineer
description:
**Om BST Group** 
  
 



 BST Group är marknadsledande inom brandskydd i Norden. Vårt omfattande nätverk förenar över 700 medarbetare i 19 bolag från fyra länder som är specialiserade på att leverera brandsäkerhetslösningar i världsklass, med starkt fokus på teknisk innovation och hållbarhet. Genom vårt samarbete över nationsgränserna kan vi effektivisera och förbättra säkerheten i samhället, samtidigt som vi bidrar till en mer hållbar framtid. Vi är stolta över att leda utvecklingen inom brandskydd, utmana befintliga standarder och sätta nya regler som garanterar tryggare samhällen och en säkrare infrastruktur. 
 



*Läs mer på* 
**bstgroupab.com** 
  
 



  





  
 



**Dina arbetsuppgifter:** 
  
 



  





 Hos oss kommer du att arbeta med utveckling och underhåll av vår dataplattform, samt stödja verksamheten genom att säkerställa att rätt data är tillgänglig för beslutsfattande och analys. Du kommer att använda Azure Data Lake för att garantera skalbar och flexibel lagring samt med hjälp av Databricks optimera våra pipelines och lyfta data till molnet. För att transformera och modellera data används dbt Cloud. 
 



  





 Du kommer att hantera utmaningar kring inkrementell dataingestion från system vi integrerar, samt optimera och genomföra datatransformationer. En del av ditt arbete innebär också att felsöka bristande indata och skapa tester som säkerställer datakvaliteten. Vi har automatiserade arbetsflöden som dagligen kör hela pipelinen, från rådata från källsystem till transformationer, modellering och uppdaterade rapporter, och dessa kommer du underhålla och vidareutveckla. 
 



 Tjänsten är placerad i Hägersten, men det finns möjlighet till distansarbete en del av arbetstiden om så önskas. 
 



  





  
 



  





**Varför är din roll viktig?** 
  
 



 Hos oss får du möjlighet att lösa komplexa problem som är centrala för vår verksamhetsutveckling. Den data du hjälper till att förädla kommer, med start efter årsskiftet, även användas för att mäta vår klimatpåverkan och hållbarhet inom hela koncernen.  
 



  





 Du kommer att ha stor frihet i ditt skapande, utan långa beslutsvägar, och du får ansvar för allt från planering till implementering av nya initiativ. Tillsammans med vår controller Kristian kan du bolla idéer för att sedan realisera de projekt ni tillsammans sätter, där du står för den datatekniska kunskapen, vilket ställer höga krav på din självständighet och ditt driv. Vi har som mål att utveckla vårt datadrivna arbetssätt och i framtiden implementera dataanalyser med hjälp av ML/AI, där du också kommer att spela en viktig roll. 
 



  





  
 



**Teknik & kvalifikationer** 
  
 



  





 Vi ser programmering som ett hantverk som kan tillämpas över olika programmeringsspråk och plattformar. För att lyckas i denna roll behöver du ha goda erfarenheter av Python och SQL. Du har även praktisk erfarenhet av ETL-processer och molnplattformar, särskilt Microsoft Azure. Det är meriterande att ha arbetat med Databricks, dbt Cloud, Power BI och AI/ML men inte ett måste. Vi letar efter dig som har ett stort tekniskt intresse och därför lär dig snabbt.  
 



  





 Vi tror du har
 
 1-3 års arbetslivserfarenhet som Data Engineer, Data Scientist eller liknande. Du har en universitetsutbildning inom relevant område och är analytiskt lagd med starkt intresse för datahantering. 
 



  
 



  





  
 



  





 Vi ser fram emot din ansökan!

title: Agile Coach
description:
Odevo is a group of exciting brands with a shared vision of challenging the status quo in the property management industry. We're committed to revolutionizing the industry with innovative software solutions that make managing properties easier, more efficient, and more effective.
 



 Our cloud-based platform is unique, and we have proven ourselves as a leading and innovative player in a brief time. Our global product development department acts as a SaaS supplier to all the companies in the Odevo group and several other players in the industry. Together, we will continue to challenge and change this industry.
 



  





 To continue our ambitious growth journey, we seek more great people to join us to build market-leading property management software products. Are you one of them?
 



 We are on the lookout for an Agile Coach who can help us take our product development organization to the next level. Your role will involve directly supporting our Nordic product development teams as well as strategically working to improve and streamline our entire product development organization.
 



  





 You will focus on few product development teams, working closely with Engineering Managers, Product Owners and other Coaches. You will be part of a talented delivery team of Agile Coaches under the leadership of our Head of Delivery. Your collaboration with the delivery team will contribute to your professional growth, and together, we aim to create an environment that encourages innovation and teamwork.
 



  





**Your key responsibilities will include:** 



* Work close within teams to boost our journey towards having empowered and high-performing teams.
* Actively guiding teams in managing their workflow and continuously improving
* Establish and implement good practices, fostering collaboration across the organization.
* Collaborate with leaders to align business objectives.
* Drive continuous improvement of Agile processes through experimentation and adaptation.
* Collaborate with Developers and other key contributors including Product Owners, Architects and Managers



  





**Who you are** 




 You are an “roll up your sleeves” leader with the ability to mentor and lead diverse teams of engineers. Your strength lies in creating a collaborative and psychologically safe environment, and you possess the unique ability to establish and nurture trust effortlessly. Collaboration is a key aspect of our organization, and we are looking for someone who can thrive while working harmoniously across departments and engaging with stakeholders at all levels.
 



 You have excellent communication and interpersonal skills, with a demonstrated ability to effectively communicate complex ideas and concepts to both technical and non-technical stakeholders. Furthermore, experience in a fast-paced, high-growth environment will be highly regarded, as it demonstrates the ability to thrive in dynamic settings.
 



  





**Experience** 



* You have a background working with high performing teams, with experience in guiding teams towards high performance by adopting agile practices.
* Experience working with product development teams.



  





 As we want the members of our team to complement each other we wish that you have one or a few of the following “superpowers”:
 


* Product leadership: Strategic thinking and vision, data and insights, product discovery, defining objectives and outcomes, data and metrics, flow principles, applying kanban in scrum environment
* Organizational development: Team topologies, continuous improvement, scaling organizations
* Leadership: coaching, mentoring, influencing, facilitation, training, feedback



  





 What we offer
 


* Collaborative Environment: Join a team that values collaboration above all else, whether in the office or remotely.
* Professional Growth: Develop your skills in a nurturing environment that values learning and mentorship. Work with some of the brightest minds to refine your coaching techniques.
* Cutting-Edge Practices: Dive into the latest Agile practices and contribute your ideas. We encourage you to lead initiatives and explore new possibilities in Agile transformation.
* Impactful Contributions: Play a significant role in shaping our product development, challenging standard practices and making a real difference.
* Commitment to Excellence: Be part of a company that prioritizes sustainable and high-quality development, where strategic innovation leads to long-term success.
* Training and capability building in agile and technical excellence



  





**Location** 




 Our headquarters is on the top floor of the newly built Sthlm 04 in Hammarby Sjöstad, which offers stunning views over Stockholm. Please note that candidates must reside in Sweden to apply for this position and are expected to work from Stockholm.

title: Systemutvecklare/ Fullstacksutvecklare
description:
*Redpill Linpro är ledande specialister inom systemutveckling baserat på open source och brinner för öppna lösningar, öppna affärsmodeller och ett öppet samhälle. Tillsammans samverkar vi för att uppnå maximal nytta för alla. Hos oss finns några av marknadens främsta experter inom sina specialområden. Vi är drygt 320 anställda och du finner oss i tre länder på sju kontor: Stockholm, Göteborg, Karlstad, Linköping samt i Köpenhamn, Oslo och Trondheim.*
**Arbetsbeskrivning**
 Nu utökar vi vårt område specialiserat på systemutveckling och vill hitta fler kollegor som brinner för att arbeta med relevant teknik och leverera mjukvarulösningar I världsklass till våra kunder! Du kommer arbeta i tätt samarbete med kund för att arbeta fram den bästa lösningen på problem och tackla utmaningar med innovativa tekniska lösningar. Vi arbetar med flera branscher där du får ta del av stora enterpriseprojekt till mindre start-ups.
   

  

**Vem är du?**
* Du är en ambitiös engagerad utvecklare/arkitekt med erfarenhet av modern Fullstack-utveckling
* Du tycker om att interagera med kunder, kollegor och användare för att diskuterahur man bäst löser problem och utmaningar med innovativa tekniska lösningar
* Du är noggrann på detaljnivå i både kodning och dokumentation och brinner för Clean Code
* Du är självständig, tar ansvar för att hålla deadlines och leverera högsta kvalitet.


**Kvalifikationer**
 För att trivas som konsult hos oss är det viktigt att du har ett stort teknikintresse och en vilja att utvecklas inom nya områden och i ny teknik. Du drivs av problemlösning och förstår att det är samarbete som för oss framåt. Du tycker också att det är viktigt att hjälpa till att skapa en riktigt bra arbetsplats genom att både driva och delta på sociala aktiviteter samt dela med dig av dina kunskaper till kollegor.
   

  

*Utöver ovanstående kompetenser ser vi gärna att du har:*
* Minst 5 års professionell erfarenhet av systemutveckling med Javascript/TypeScript, Java eller liknande – Gärna på ramverk såsom Spring Boot, Node.js, React och Angular
* Kunskaper i Microservices och containerteknik
* Erfarenhet av cloud
* Praktisk erfarenhet av teamarbete (Scrumerfarenhet är ett plus)
* Bekväm med svenska och engelska


**Varför Redpill Linpro?**
* Du får arbeta med några av de allra mest begåvade IT-talangerna i en organisation som brinner för professionella Open Source-ideal
* Du får arbeta med spännande projekt i flera olika branscher: allt från startups till globala jättar och myndigheter där du får vara med och göra skillnad på riktigt!
* Du får trevliga chefer som för en bra personalpolitik - våra konsulter är våra superstars och prioriteras alltid först
* Du får arbeta med den senaste tech-stacken och alltid vara up-to-date med ny teknologi
* Du får ta del av fördelarna att arbeta på ett medelstort nordiskt bolag med fantastisk sammanhållning, bra förmåner och där du ges stor frihet och flexibilitet i ditt arbete


 Tveka inte att höra av dig om du vill arbeta med oss. Vi ser fram emot din ansökan!
   

  

 Redpill Linpro is the leading provider of Open Source services and products in the Nordics. We are located in Oslo, Stockholm, Gothenburg, Karlstad Linköping, Copenhagen, Aarhus, and Trondheim with a mission to share knowledge and best practices for a more open society.
   

  

 We are passionate about open solutions, open business models, and an open society where we work together for maximum benefit to everyone. We have got some really skilled co-workers here at Redpill Linpro, particularly within our main areas: API management, development, IT operations, data analytics, customer experience, cloud, DevOps, and automation.
   

  

**May the Source be with you!**

title: Innovativ Solution Architect
description:
Beskrivning av tjänsten
   

  

 CGI söker en Innovativ Architect/Solution Architect
   

  

 Vi söker en erfaren Architect/Solution Architect med en unik förmåga att tänka utanför ramarna och driva affärsmöjligheter genom tekniska innovationer. I denna roll kommer du att ansvara för att skapa och implementera strategiska kundplaner och roadmaps, samtidigt som du genomför djupa analyser av kundmiljöer för att identifiera möjligheter till förbättring och tillämpning av ny teknologi. Du kommer att vara en central aktör i att driva innovationsprojekt och fungera som en rådgivare för våra kunder, med fokus på att skapa värde och öka deras konkurrenskraft.
   

  

 CGI är världsledande inom IT- och affärskonsulting. Vi hjälper våra kunder att lyckas med sina digitala transformationer och leverera mervärde till sina kunder. I CGI:s Business Unit Global Technology Operations (BU GTO) fokuserar vi på att leverera innovativa och skräddarsydda lösningar som möter våra kunders unika behov.
   

  

 Dina framtida arbetsuppgifter
   

  

 Du kommer att jobba som en del av lokal ledningsgrupp där vi tillsammans sätter agendan för kort och medium term med stor vikt på input från hela teamet för att tillvarata allas styrkor. Teamet består av ledare och Solution leads och enheten består av Engagement/Service Delivery Managers och Service Delivery Experts. Tillsammans levererar vi tjänster och konsulter till både internationella storbolag likväl som up and coming mindre bolag.
   

  

 Dina Ansvarsområden:
   

  

* Skapa och implementera strategiska kundplaner och roadmaps
* Genomföra djupgående analyser av kundmiljöer för att identifiera möjligheter till förbättring och innovation
* Driva innovationsprojekt och vara en nyckelspelare i att utveckla nya affärsmöjligheter
* Fungera som en teknisk rådgivare för våra kunder och internt inom organisationen
* Arbeta nära kundprojektteam för att leverera skräddarsydda lösningar som överträffar förväntningarna


 Kvalifikationer för att bli framgångsrik denna roll
   

  

 Din Profil:
   

  

* Minst 5 års erfarenhet av att skapa roadmaps och kundprojekt med djupa analyser
* Stark kompetens inom teknisk arkitektur och lösningar
* Förmåga att tänka innovativt och identifiera möjligheter till teknisk förbättring
* Meriterande erfarenhet av att driva innovationsprojekt och hitta nya affärsmöjligheter
* Utmärkta kommunikationsfärdigheter på svenska och engelska
* Svenskt medborgarskap


 På CGI får du möjlighet att arbeta i en dynamisk och mångsidig miljö där din kompetens och passion för teknik kommer att uppskattas och belönas. Vi erbjuder konkurrenskraftiga förmåner, möjligheter till personlig och professionell utveckling samt en stimulerande arbetsplats där innovation och samarbete står i fokus.
   

  

 Om du är redo att ta nästa steg i din karriär och bli en del av ett framgångsrikt team, skicka in din ansökan idag och bli en del av CGI:s spännande resa mot digital förvandling och innovation!
   

  

 Ansök genom att skicka ditt CV och personligt brev så snart som möjligt då vi löpande går igenom ansökningar och vill tillsätta rollen omgående.
   

  

 Har du frågor kring rollen kan du kontakta anställande chef Jenny Thernström Gärtner, Director Consulting Delivery på jenny.thernstromgartner@cgi.com
   

  

 CGI - Your Partner of Choice in Digital Transformation
   

  

**Låt oss som ägare omvandla verklig insikt till handling – tillsammans.**
 Livet på CGI bygger på ägande, lagarbete, respekt och tillhörighet. Tillsammans med oss kommer du att kunna nå din fulla potential.
   

  

 Du är inbjuden att ta ägandeskap redan från första dagen i vårt arbete med att förverkliga vår dröm om att skapa en arbetsmiljö där vi trivs med att arbeta tillsammans och bidrar till framgången för vårt företag. Det är därför vi kallar oss CGI Partners snarare än anställda. Vi drar nytta av vår kollektiva framgång och tillsammans får vi möjlighet att aktivt forma vår företagsstrategi och inriktning.
   

  

 Ditt arbete skapar värde. Du kommer att vara med att utveckla innovativa lösningar och bygga relationer med medarbetare och kunder samtidigt som du får tillgång till globala möjligheter att skala upp dina idéer, omfamna nya möjligheter och dra nytta av gedigen bransch- och teknikexpertis.
   

  

 Du kommer att forma din karriär tillsammans med ett företag som är byggt för att växa och bestå. Du får stöd av ledare som bryr sig om din hälsa och ditt välbefinnande och ger dig möjligheter att fördjupa dina kunskaper och vidga dina vyer.
   

  

 Bli en del en av världens största leverantörer av IT- och affärskonsulttjänster.

title: Senior Security Engineer 12 months Fixed Term Contract
description:
**Craft:**
 Technology & Development
   

  

**Job Description:**
 We are looking for a skilled Senior Security Engineer to protect our Kingdom and join our security team in London, Stockholm or Malmö for 12 months.
   

  

 Your role within our Kingdom
   

  

 As our Senior Security Engineer, you will be part of our Platform Security group, and will build, improve and maintain our security platform, protecting our cloud environments as well as code, games, and the platforms that keep them up and running.
   

  

 You will participate in the definition, implementation and support of security in the SDLC, and you will define procedures for how to handle security issues and integrate security in the entire building process of our games.
   

  

 Skills To Create Thrills
   

  

 You have a learner and self-starter attitude so you’re able to take direction and execute tasks on your own while working in a team. We will appreciate much more the ability to learn and the interest in growing as an expert in the role than any previous experience.
   

  

 Other skills include:
   

  

* +4 years of technical experience in any security field, ideally integrating security tooling, scripting, devops, or solving security problems.
* Specific knowledge deploying and integrating Static application security testing (SAST) tools such as Sonarqube into SDLC pipelines
* Experience with Github Actions
* Experience in cloud environments, AWS, Azure, or ideally, GCP.
* Knowledge of container solutions like Docker
* Experience automating processes, developing tools and scripting, ideally in Python.
* Experience with SQL queries and/or data analytic tools (Looker, Tableau, or others).
* Must know what JSON is.
* Solid knowledge about security concepts.
* Willingness to do occasional traveling.


 Tasty Bonus Skills
   

  

* Experience working, deploying and integrating SDLC security tools.
* Familiarity with terms such as SAST, SCA or SBOM.
* Experience in patch management, vulnerability scanning and reporting in SDLC or cloud could come in handy.
* Experience on SIEM platforms, like Splunk or Bigquery.
* If you maintain your own open source security project or have contributed to a project we would love to see it.
* Security certifications won’t be evaluated, but skills in the right areas will.


**About King**
 At King, we're Making the World Playful. Heard of Candy Crush? We're the creators behind it. With game studios in Stockholm, Malmö, London, Barcelona and Berlin, and offices in Dublin, San Francisco, New York, and Malta, we have a 20-year history of delivering some of the world's most iconic games in the mobile gaming industry and are on a mission to level-up the little moments for our more than 200 million active monthly users. But we aren't just crushing it with candies, we're also behind Farm Heroes, Bubble Witch, Pet Rescue and loads of other sweet games. As a leading interactive entertainment company for the mobile world, King is part of Activision Blizzard, which was acquired by Microsoft.
   

  

**A Great Saga Needs All Sorts of Heroes**
 King strives to be a place where everyone can be their most authentic self. We recognize that diversity, equity and inclusion is a vital and continuous conversation, and that change only happens when we all come together. It’s our mission to build a diverse and inclusive Kingdom for our people, players, and community.
   

  

**Making the World Playful**
 Making the World Playful is our mission – it’s the thread that connects our people, our players, and our passion for our games. Let’s face it, who doesn’t love a bit of fun?
   

  

 Kingsters are seriously playful: creative thinkers who balance art and science to bring moments of magic to millions daily. But our players aren’t the only ones that can level-up. We’re always looking for ways to champion each other and make what’s already great, even better.
   

  

 So, if this feels like a fun way to spend your days, and you share our passion, our values, and our hunger to shape the future, join us in Making the World Playful.
   

  

 Applications need to be in English.
   

  

 Discover King at careers.king.com

title: Senior Backend Developer
description:
Kundo är ett SaaS-bolag som erbjuder Nordens mest okrångliga kundservicelösning. Kundservice är en bransch i snabb förändring där ny teknik/AI har medfört stora möjligheter till innovation och effektivisering. Det innebär att vi har en spännande resa framför oss där vår produkt både ska byggas ut men också transformeras för att möta nya behov och de möjligheter som finns med AI.
 



 På vår fortsatta tillväxtresa letar vi efter dig som vill ansluta till vårt fantastiska produktutvecklingsteam som backend-utvecklare med kunskap och intresse för infrastruktur och drift.
 



 Denna roll kommer att bidra till att framtidssäkra vår plattform och möjliggöra våra AI-drivna initiativ, delta i utvecklingsprojekt, samt vidareutveckla och underhålla vår skalbar cloud-arkitektur och hantering av säkerhetslösningar. För att trivas i rollen tror vi att du har:
 



  




* Minst 5 år erfarenhet av webbutveckling
* Bred erfarenhet av produktutveckling i Python
* Djup kunskap av AWS infrastruktur och Infrastructure as code
* Känner dig trygg gällande DevOps praxis och har praktisk erfarenhet av mjukvaru-releaser (helst continous deployment)



  





**Om vår produkt** 




 Med vår produkt får våra kunder ett modernt och kraftfullt kundserviceverktyg att samarbeta i för att svara på alla ärenden som de får in. Med hjälp av vår produkt levererar organisationer i Norden en bättre kundserviceupplevelse till tiotusentals kunder varje dag.
 



 Flera miljoner meddelanden passerar genom våra system varje månad - och den siffran ökar hela tiden. Enkelheten i att använda våra tjänster är mycket uppskattat av våra kunder och något vi är stolta över.
 



 Undrar du vilka tekniker vi arbetar med? Här är de tekniker du kommer att arbeta med:
 



  




* Python - Django/FastAPI
* AWS (Kostnadsoptimering, Nätverk, IAM)
* Kubernetes
* Terraform
* MySQL
* Elastic Search



  





**Vad kan vi erbjuda dig?** 



* Små team med täta samarbeten inom och utanför teamet
* Högt lärande och delaktighet i alla delar av produktutvecklingen
* Goda förmåner som ett 32 dagars semester, kollektivavtal, friskvårdsbidrag på 5000 kr/år, pension (ITP-1) och privatvårdsförsäkring
* Hybrid-upplägg som möjliggör remotearbete 2 dagar/vecka
* Konferensresa varje höst, roliga teamaktiviteter och interna events, sommarfest och julbord, etc



  





 Har du några frågor? Vi berättar gärna mer! Hör av dig till Jonatan Larsson på 070-5124424 eller jonatan@kundo.se. Till denna tjänst tar vi ingen hjälp av partners, utan kommer att sköta processerna på egen hand internt.

title: Senior Technology Risk Manager
description:
**Job ID: 26231** 






  

  



**Would you like to help the bank manage Technology risks? We are now looking for a** 
**Technology** 
**Risk Manager to coordinate and drive risk and compliance activities within the Domain.**
 At Nordea, we see that the world is changing fast – and we want to be one step ahead of the curve. That’s why we’re deeply committed to providing the financial solutions of tomorrow to our customers. We’re creating an agile environment where we experiment and grow together – and we need your ideas and unique background. With us, you’ll be in good company with a chance to make your mark on something bigger. 
 





  

  



**About this opportunity** 






  

  




 Welcome to the Technology Risk Management unit. Technology Risk Management’s ambition is to take on complex tasks and bring them from idea phase to realisation. In parallel, we increase risk awareness and continuously build structures and procedures that give Nordea Technology management excellent qualitative support.
 











  
 
















 As the Risk Manager supporting Technology in Nordea, you will work in the 1st Line of Defence and help to drive initiatives to increase Technology risk awareness and ensure prudent risk and control management.
 











  

  



**What you’ll be doing:** 





* Provide advisory to monitor and report Nordea’s
 

 Technology
 

 risk portfolio and associated controls
* Lead and participate in risk assessments, process control and mitigation, support the
 

 Technology 
 

 division in the end-to-end risk process overview
* Roll-out services according to frameworks and guidelines in the bank, and support in enhancing risk and compliance culture
* Secure necessary input, anchoring and optimising the decision-making process, with a holistic approach, and that tasks are adequately managed
* Develop quality analysis, communication material, reports and decision-making proposals to executive management, stakeholders and to risk governance forums



  
 





 Your work life balance is important to us, and you will have the opportunity to work remotely a couple of days a week.
 





  

  



 You’ll join a Nordic and Polish team, passionate about providing risk and compliance services through business and technological insight.  The role is based in Stockholm.
 





  

  



**Who you are**




 Collaboration. Ownership. Passion. Courage. These are the values that guide us in being at our best – and that we imagine you share with us.  
   

  

**To succeed in this role, we believe that you:** 





* Love learning and trying new things and you’re excited about bringing your ideas to the table.
* Have strong interest in being coordinator for activities and play a central role in driving change as well as support the creation of a great customer experience
* Like collaboration with multidisciplinary teams, and find it interesting and rewarding to work in a cross-border Nordics & Poland organisation
* Have stakeholder management skills and communication skills to provide partnership and insight with divisional teams, while aligning with the 2nd LoD



  

  



**Your experience and background:** 





* Three to four years of experience working in Technology risk or audit management, preferably in a regulated or big organisation
* Formal certifications in CRISC, COBIT, CISA, CISM or similar will be considered, as well as knowledge or practical experience with ISO 27001/2
* Understanding of general cybersecurity concepts like EDR, Patch and Vulnerability Management, Threat detection, Identity and Access Management, Data Leakage Protection, Encryption and Key Management and Cloud Security
* Fluency in written and spoken English



  

  



 If this sounds like you, get in touch!
 





  
 





**Next steps**




 Submit your application no later than
 



 27/10/2024
 



 . For more information, you’re welcome to contact Anne Maarit Saarnio.
   

  

 At Nordea, we know that an inclusive workplace is a sustainable workplace. We deeply believe that our diverse backgrounds, experiences, characteristics and traits make us better at serving customers and communities. So please come as you are.
 





  
 





 Please be aware that any applications or CVs coming through email or direct messages will not be accepted or considered.
 





  
 





 ​For union information, please contact finansforbundet@nordea.se or SACONordea@nordea.com.

title: SAP Integration Architect - People and Culture IT
description:
Scania is currently undergoing an exciting transformation from a traditional truck manufacturer to a provider of complete sustainable transport solutions. IT is a crucial part of this transformation as Scania’s success depends on flexible and efficient IT solutions that support current and future business requirements.
   

  

**About The Job**
 The group People & Culture IT Solutions supports Scania with People & Culture (P&C) IT-solutions, covering the whole lifecycle, from requirement analysis to implementation and production. Scania’s business is changing over time, and we are on a journey phasing out older applications and implementing modern technologies. We are replacing local solutions with a global way of working and a more consistent application landscape.
   

  

 Globalization, digitalization, and mobility are examples of trends that are affecting our business environment. We are moving towards SAP SuccessFactors, SaaS (Software as a Service), and AWS (Amazon Web Services) in our IT landscape.
   

  

 We are now looking for a new colleague who wants to work with us on our global SAP SuccessFactors in the P&C organization and take responsibility for the integrations and their deliverables, while broadening their knowledge within the business area of People & Culture (P&C).
   

  

 Being an integration architect within P&C IT means developing a wide network of contacts globally. Therefore, networking, dialogue, and cooperation should feel natural to you. We believe you value sharing information and competence with your colleagues within your organization.
   

  

 Responsibilities include analyzing, designing, testing, and deploying integrations using various tools and technologies. Additionally, you will support, troubleshoot, and monitor existing integrations between SAP SuccessFactors and our in-house integration platform called HR Hub. You will plan integration support activities connected to Scania business units building integrations to their local HR environments. You will work with integration experts to optimize and improve performance and reliability on existing integrations as well as document and maintain the integration architecture and code. You will also prioritize and align deliveries from the central integration team.
   

  

 You should be good at communication and coordination with other developers and stakeholders. It’s important to follow best practices and standards for integration development and stay updated with the latest trends and developments in integration technologies.
   

  

 Most importantly, we believe you enjoy being in a team and solving problems together!
   

  

**Responsibilites**
* Responsible for the integration strategy of global P&C systems
* Set the architectural guidelines for the integration area and actively advocate the usage of industry standards and best practices within the organization, in connection with the central IT integration strategy
* Ownership in keeping the Data Model in sync between the integration platform and SuccessFactors
* Actively contribute to the Architect team
* Responsible for the team of integration specialists, team planning, and prioritization
* Represent the integration team in P&C and architect forums
* Stakeholder communication and management towards Scania business units globally
* Plan and coordinate integration support activities connected to Scania business units globally that have built integrations to their local HR environment
* Work together with the HR Hub Product Owner to prioritize and align deliveries from the central integration team
* Hands-on problem-solving when needed


**Who You Are**
 You are self-motivated, structured, well-organized, and service-minded with an agile mindset. You are willing to learn and explore new areas outside your comfort zone and would like to develop in the integration area.
   

  

**Integration Architect Requirements:**
* Bachelor’s degree in computer science, software engineering, or a related field
* 5+ years of experience as an integration developer and integration architect
* Experience working with agile methods and tools
* Good knowledge in CPI and BTP
* Familiar with various integration methods such as API and SFTP
* Knowledge in code languages such as JSON, SQL (e.g., MySQL, TSQL)
* Knowledge in XML or similar standards
* Knowledge in functional and technical integration design and information modeling
* Knowledge of software development life cycle and methodologies
* Excellent analytical, problem-solving, and debugging skills
* Strong communication, collaboration, and time management skills
* Attention to detail and quality-oriented mindset
* Experience leading technical projects
* Previous experience working in a global context
* Fluent in English


**Knowledge or Experience That Is Good to Have:**
* Experience with other scripting languages like JavaScript, Groovy, etc.
* Experience with systems in the HR/People & Culture area
* SAP SuccessFactors knowledge
* Previous work experience from Scania


**What We Offer**
 Scania is on a journey with a strong purpose: to drive the shift towards a sustainable transport system. To get there, we have gathered a diverse team with talented and fun colleagues, endless development opportunities and good work-life balance. We work a mix of remote and in office. Our offices are activity based with a lot of creative spaces in Södertälje, and we also have a new office hub close to the central station in Stockholm. Furthermore, you are offered annual bonus, lunch to reduced prices, wellness contribution and much more.
   

  

 For questions about the job, reach out to hiring manager Petra Sandström, petra.sandstrom@scania.com
   

  

 A background check might be conducted on the final candidate.

title: Infrastrukturspecialist med inriktning Linux
description:
Svenska kraftnät är en av de viktigaste aktörerna för en hållbar energiomställning. Hos oss erbjuds du ett viktigt jobb, i vilket du kommer att bidra till Sveriges elförsörjning. Vi behöver dig för att lyckas med vårt samhällsviktiga uppdrag att elektrifiera Sverige.
 



  





 Vi är i dag ca 500 personer på IT och vi kommer att växa med ytterligare de kommande åren. Detta för att kunna skapa förutsättningar för Sverige att kunna fördubbla sin elproduktion och nå klimatmålen genom att helt ställa om till fossilfri energi. För att lyckas kommer vi att använda oss av den senaste tekniken för att öka kapaciteten i vår infrastruktur och samtidigt öka utvecklingstakten kring system, digitalisering och processer.
 



  





**Om tjänsten** 




  





 Tjänsten innebär att arbeta i vår komplexa IT-leverans av samhällskritisk IT-infrastruktur. Du kommer att vara med på en spännande resa när vi expanderar och bygger en ny plattform. Med egen kontroll över drift och utveckling av samtliga lager av infrastrukturen har Svenska kraftnät stort fokus på att öka leveransförmågan för att lyckas digitalisera kraftsystemet, ställa om till förnybar el och på sikt fördubbla elproduktionen. Vi är en IT-tung organisation som gör stora investeringar.
 



  





 Du blir delaktig och bidrar i den nya tekniska plattformen med möjlighet att påverka framtida teknikval och lösningar. Vi fokuserar på säkerhet när vi inför nya arbetssätt, automatiserar och ökar robusthet och hastighet.
 



  





 Du kommer att tillhöra enheten Server Infrastruktur. Teamet arbetar och förstår tekniken på djupet och ser till helheten i miljön. Tillsammans bygger vi upp system och teknikplattformar. Vi arbetar med metoder och produkter så som AD, PKI, PowerShell, VMware och Azure DevOps.
 



  





 I rollen ingår att arbeta med drift, förvaltning och utveckling inom vår Linux plattform. Du hanterar ärenden som incidenter och beställningar, deltar i projekt och planering av teamets aktiviteter. Vi arbetar enligt ITIL och PM3.
 



  





 Arbetsuppgifterna kommer att anpassas efter din erfarenhet inom området. Hos oss finns goda utvecklingsmöjligheter.
 



  





**Om dig** 




 Vi söker dig som är;
 



  





 -bra på att samarbeta och som tar initiativ
 



  





 -nyfiken på teknik och har förmåga och vilja att ta till dig nya kunskaper och är positiv till utveckling och förändring
 



  





 -flexibel och anpassningsbar efter arbetsbelastning
 



  





 -ödmjuk, har lätt för att skapa förtroende och är och tydlig i din kommunikation
 



  





 -resultatinriktad med ett stort intresse för att skapa hållbara och säkra IT-lösningar.
 



  





 Vi lägger stor vikt vid dina personliga egenskaper.
 



  





 Vidare ser vi att du har examen inom IT eller motsvarande kompetens förvärvad på annat sätt. Du har även:
 



  





 -Aktuell och relevant erfarenhet inom IT-infrastruktur med fokus mot Linux
 



  





 -Goda kunskaper i svenska och engelska i tal och skrift
 



  





 -B-körkort
 



  





 Vi ser det som meriterande om du har erfarenhet av förvaltning och drift av Unix system och/eller har erfarenhet av att bygga skript i BASH, Ansible eller Python.
 



  





**Bra att veta** 




  





 Tjänsten är placerad i Sundbyberg
 



  





 Möjlighet till distansarbete upp till 50 %
 



  





 Sista ansökningsdag 2024-09-30. Vi tar inte emot personligt brev i samband med din ansökan
 



  





 Tjänsten är en tillsvidaretjänst utan provanställning
 



  





 Beredskapsarbete ingår i tjänsten
 



  





 I denna rekrytering samarbetar vi med IDG Recruitment. Vid frågor kontakta rekryteringskonsult Oscar Nordström, oscar.nordstrom@foundryco.com alternativt Maria Sahlén rekryterare hos Svenska kraftnät, 010-489 20 27, maria.sahlen2@svk.se. Fackliga representanter är Annika Ingeborn, SACO, 010 475 87 72 och Mikael Hedenheim, ST, tel. 010-475 84 68. Du når oss också via e-post: fornamn.efternamn@svk.se.
 



  





 Under semestertider nås vi på mail och svarstiden kan vara längre än vanligt.
 



  





**Övrig information** 




  





 Vi ställer höga krav på våra medarbetares säkerhets- och sekretessmedvetenhet. Innan ett beslut om anställning fattas kommer en säkerhetsprövning enligt säkerhetsskyddslagen (2018:585) att genomföras i de fall befattningen innebär hantering av säkerhetsskyddsklassificerade uppgifter eller deltagande i säkerhetskänslig verksamhet. Om anställningen avser befattning i säkerhetsklass kommer säkerhetsprövningen även att innefatta en registerkontroll och, i vissa fall, en särskild personutredning.
 



  





 För anställning på Svenska kraftnät krävs svenskt medborgarskap. Med anställningen följer en skyldighet att krigsplaceras.
